sentences.text: To our stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to invite you to attend the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders of Gilead Sciences, Inc., to be held on Wednesday, May 10, 2017 at 10:00 a.m. local time at the Westin San Francisco Airport, 1 Old Bayshore Highway, Millbrae, California.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details regarding admission to the meeting and the business to be conducted are more fully described in the Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you attend the annual meeting, we hope you will vote as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are th ways that you can cast your ballot  by telephone, by Internet or by mailing the proxy card (if you request one).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please review the instructions included in the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your ongoing support and continued interest in Gilead Sciences, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to seeing you at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John F. Milligan President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON MAY 10, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TO THE STOCKHOLDERS OF GILEAD SCIENCES, INC.:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders (the Annual Meeting) of Gilead Sciences, Inc., a Delaware corporation (Gilead), will be held on Wednesday, May 10, 2017 at 10:00 a.m. local time at the Westin San Francisco Airport, 1 Old Bayshore Highway, Millbrae, California 94030 for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect nine directors to serve for the next year and until their successors are elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To ratify the selection of Ernst & Young LLP by the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors as the independent registered public accounting firm of Gilead for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To approve a restatement of the Gilead Sciences, Inc. 2004 Equity Incentive Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of our Named Executive Officers as presented in the Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To vote, on an advisory basis, as to the frequency with which executive compensation will be subject to future advisory tockholder votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. To vote on a stockholder proposal, if properly presented at the meeting, requesting that the Board take steps to permit stockholder action by written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. To vote on a stockholder proposal, if properly presented at the meeting, requesting that the Board adopt a policy that the Chairman of the Board of Directors be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8. To transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing items of business are more fully described in the Proxy Statement accompanying this Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has fixed the close of business on March 16, 2017 as the record date for the determination of stockholders ntitled to notice of and to vote at the Annual Meeting and at any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brett A. Pletcher
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brett A. Pletcher Corporate Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Foster City, California March 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of our common stock at the close of business on March 16, 2017 and holders of a valid legal proxy for the Annual Meeting are entitled to attend the Annual Meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you expect to attend the Annual Meeting, please grant a proxy to vote by telephone or Internet or complete, date, sign and return the proxy card mailed to you (if you request one) as promptly as possible in order to ensure your representation at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you have given your proxy, you may still vote in person if you attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be admitted to the Annual Meeting, you must present valid government- issued photo identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are not a stockholder of record but hold shares in the name of a broker, bank or other holder of record, you must provide proof of beneficial ownership as of March 16, 2017, such as a brokerage or bank account statement, a copy of the voting instruction form provided by your broker, bank, trustee or nominee, or other similar evidence of ownership.

sentences.text: INTRODUCTION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting and this Proxy Statement provide an important opportunity for us to communicate with you about the achievements of the past year and our stewardship of Gilead.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As you consider your vote, we ask that you carefully review the information in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide an overview of our business and summarize below key aspects of our performance, executive compensation and corporate governance to assist your review of the more detailed information herein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Performance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focused on Five Therapeutic Areas: We have 21 products and our primary areas of focus include HIV, liver diseases, such as chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection and chronic hepatitis B virus (HBV) infection, hematology/oncology, cardiovascular and inflammation/respiratory diseases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delivering a Cure Created a New Revenue Dynamic: Our HCV products created a new revenue dynamic for us as they offer cure rates as high as 95-99 percent for all genotypes (1-6) of HCV infection in less time (as little as eight weeks) and with fewer side effects than prior treatments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These products are characterized by a rapid uptake after launch as a warehoused group of patients seek treatment followed by a deceleration of demand as that group of patients complete their treatment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This effect caused our HCV and total revenues to increase dramatically from 2013 to 2015 and then to decline in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our share price movement in recent years reflects the impact of delivering a cure to a life-threatening illness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focused on Investing for Long-Term Growth: While our HCV cures have created revenue volatility in the short-term, the significant revenue growth generated by these products provides us with the resources to invest in our internal pipeline and external opportunities in order to create long-term stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outperforming Indices over the Last Five Years: Our total revenue grew 262% over the last five years and our stock price performance during the same period far exceeded the Nasdaq Biotech Index and S&P 500 Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved this growth while enhancing our operating margins and maintaining an operationally efficient organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock performance reflects the cumulative return on investment assuming an investment of $100 in our common stock, the NBI Index and the S&P 500 Index on December 30, 2011, and that all dividends were reinvested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: * Data per S&P Research Insight as of December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Decline in Revenues in the Most Recent Year: In 2016, our revenues declined 7% compared to 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This was our first year of declining revenues since 2003 and was attributable to the dynamics of the HCV market following introduction of our HCV products as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HIV and Other Antiviral Product Revenues Growth: Revenues for our HIV and other antiviral products were up 17% over 2015 and 24% over the past three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our HIV and other antiviral product revenues represented 43% of our total product sales, up from 34% in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sales in each of our other therapeutic areas also increased.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operational Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our continued success will be driven by advancing our drug development pipeline and achieving other operational goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key achievements in 2016 included the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Successful launch of four new products in 2016  (1) Odefsey  for the treatment of HIV, (2) Descovy  for the treatment of HIV (3) Epclusa  for the treatment of HCV and (4) Vemlidy  for the treatment of HBV.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Significant pipeline progress across all therapeutic areas, including pending regulatory approval of the fixed-dose combination of sofosbuvir/velpatisivir/voxilaprevir for the treatment of HCV.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highlights include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positive results from a Phase 2 trial evaluating selonsertib in patients with nonalcoholic steatohepatitis and moderate to severe liver fibrosis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advanced selonsertib to Phase 3 clinical trials;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advanced filgotinib, a JAK1 inhibitor, to Phase 3 trials for three inflammatory disease indications  rheumatoid arthritis, Crohns disease and ulcerative colitis;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positive data from a Phase 2 study demonstrating that bictegravir and emtricitabine/tenofovir alafenamide for the treatment of HIV demonstrated high virologic response rates; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positive data from Phase 3 studies evaluating the safety and efficacy of switching virologically suppressed HIV-1 infected patients from regimens containing Truvada  to regimens containing Descovy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By the end of 2016, we had treated approximately 1.3 million HCV-infected individuals around the world with our breakthrough HCV drugs in just three years while eliminating the debilitating side effects of earlier
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: drugs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, more than 10 million HIV patients in resource-limited countries are receiving a Gilead-based HIV regimen, representing two-thirds of the countries in the world and the regions hardest hit by HIV/AIDS.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Executive Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Policies and Practices at a Glance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What we do not do
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Robust Executive Stock Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executives are prohibited from hedging or pledging our stock
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback policy allows for recoupment of any unearned compensation if financial results subsequently restated
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committees independent consultant performs no other work for Gilead
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No repricing of stock options without stockholder approval
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No single trigger severance benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pre-established grant date practice for approving executive officers equity awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No excise tax gross-ups
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Minimal perquisites to executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No employment agreements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay and performance alignment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation programs are designed to directly link pay with performance, creating appropriate incentives for our Named Executive Officers (NEOs) to take actions that ultimately increase the value of Gilead and stockholder returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A substantial portion of compensation for each Named Executive Officer is tied directly to Gileads performance, with 90% of our Chief Executive Officers direct compensation and 83% of direct compensation for our other NEOs based on corporate performance and paid in the form of long-term equity awards and annual cash bonuses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long- term equity incentive awards have historically been the largest component of our total direct compensation opportunities for our executive officers and comprise 73% of our Chief Executive Officers direct compensation and 64% of direct compensation of our other NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this mix is appropriate because the NEOs should focus their efforts on achieving short- and long- term corporate results, which will ultimately drive stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity compensation is 100% performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The equity award component of our executive officer compensation packages comprises both stock options and performance share awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both of these vehicles are performance-oriented, as our executive officers realize no pay delivery from their awards unless Gilead performs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock options are granted at the market price of our common stock on the date of grant and, therefore, require our common stock to appreciate in value before our executive officers realize any economic benefit from their awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance share awards require not only stock price appreciation, as measured in terms of our total shareholder return (TSR) relative to an industry comparator group, but also revenue growth measured in absolute terms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By aligning the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: majority of the NEOs compensation with our absolute and relative TSR performance, our NEOs only realize value from this pay component when our TSR performs well, which aligns with the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 realized pay reflects impact of declining revenues from our HCV products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance-based approach to compensation is functioning as intended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our fiscal 2016 financial and relative TSR performance resulted in performance-based equity pay that was significantly below the target amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Earnings under our 2014 performance share awards, for which the multi-year performance period was completed at the end of fiscal 2016, are based on our three-year TSR performance and the cumulative revenue performance over the past three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our NEOs did not earn any shares under the 2014 TSR performance share awards, and the 2016 sub-tranche of the Revenue performance share awards was achieved at 79% of target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stock options granted in 2016 had no value as of December 31, 2016 since stock options only provide value if our stock price appreciates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, as of December 31, 2016, all stock options granted over the past three years had no value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 bonus payout was 23% below 2015 bonus payout
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2014 TSR PSUs were earned at 0%
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Revenue PSUs were earned at 79% of target (2)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 stock options currently have no value
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Actual performance share value is based on 0% payout for TSR tranche and 160% payout of the target shares for the absolute reven tranche valued at $70.31 as of the release date of February 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target stock option value is based on the 2016 stock option grant, valued as of the actual grant date fair value; actual stock option value is based on the value of the 2016 stock option grant as of December 31, 2016.

sentences.text: Target bonus value is based on target amount of 150% of base salary; actual annual bonus earned was at 116% of target.

sentences.text: Responsiveness to Stockholders and Strong Support of Executive Compensation Programs by Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a history of being responsive to stockholder feedback.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, based on stockholder feedback in 2015, we adopted proxy access in that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we contacted a number of our stockholders and the two largest proxy advisors to gain valuable insights into the issues about which they care most.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to continuing the dialogue on key corporate governance topics such as board refreshment and environmental, social and governance reporting, we asked our stockholders whether they had any concerns about our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholders we contacted did not express concerns about our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2016 annual meeting of stockholders, approximately 96% of the votes cast were in favor of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee carefully reviews feedback from our engagement activities and the voting results when making decisions regarding our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee did not change our executive compensation program based on the 2016 stockholder advisory vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective March 10, 2016, John C. Martin, Ph.D., formerly our Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, assumed the role of Executive Chairman, and John F. Milligan, Ph.D., formerly our President and Chief Operating Officer, was promoted to President and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the promotion, Dr. Milligan was appointed to serve on Gileads Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has chosen to separate the roles of Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Guidelines provide that the independent directors will designate a lead independent director when the Chairman is an employee of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The defined role of lead independent director at Gilead is closely aligned with the role of an independent Chairman, ensuring a strong, independent and active Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Lead Independent Director Charter adopted by our Board, the lead independent director has clearly delineated and comprehensive duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presiding at meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serving as principal liaison between the independent directors and the Chairman and between the independent directors and senior management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving information sent to the Board and its committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving agendas for the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving meeting schedules to ensure there is sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: calling meetings of the independent directors when necessary and appropriate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: responding directly to stockholder and other stakeholder questions and comments that are directed to the lead independent director or to the independent directors as a group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: advising the Board and the Board committees on the retention of advisers and consultants to report directly to the Board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: communicating to management, as appropriate, the results of private discussions among independent directors.

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT FOR THE 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS MAY 10, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing these proxy materials in connection with the solicitation by the Board of Directors (the Board) of Gilead Sciences, nc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: , a Delaware corporation (Gilead, we, our or us), of proxies to be voted at our 2017 annual meeting of stockholders (the Annual Meeting) to be held on Wednesday, May 10, 2017 at 10:00 a.m. local time, or at any adjournment or postponement thereof, for he purposes set forth herein and in the accompanying Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held at the Westin San Francisco Airport, 1 Old Bayshore Highway, Millbrae, California 94030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We first mailed or made available this Proxy Statement and the accompanying proxy card on or about March 27, 2017 to all stockholders entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Why did I receive a notice regarding the availability of proxy materials on the Internet?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to rules adopted by the Securities and Exchange Commission (the SEC), we have elected to provide access to our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) to our stockholders of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This approach conserves natural resources and reduces our costs of printing and distributing our proxy materials, while providing stockholders with a convenient way to access our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders will have the ability to access the proxy materials on the website referred to in the Notice or to request a printed set of the proxy materials, including a proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet or to request a printed copy may be found in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. How may I obtain a copy of Gileads Annual Report on Form 10-K and other financial information?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of our 2016 Annual Report, which includes our Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, is available at http://www.gilead.com/proxy or may be requested from our Investor Relations department as described elsewhere in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 Annual Report is not incorporated into this Proxy Statement and should not be considered proxy solicitation material.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Who is entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of our common stock at the close of business on March 16, 2017 are entitled to receive the Notice of Annual Meeting and to vote their shares at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of that date, there were 1,307,236,587 shares of common stock outstanding and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of common stock is entitled to one vote on each matter to be voted upon at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. What do I need to do to attend the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of our common stock at the close of business on March 16, 2017 and holders of a valid legal proxy for the Annual Meeting are entitled to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each individual must present valid government-issued photo identification, such as a drivers license or passport, for admission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are not a stockholder of record but hold shares in the name of a broker, bank or other holder of record, you must provide proof of beneficial ownership as of March 16, 2017, such as a brokerage or bank account statement, a copy of the voting instruction form provided by your broker, bank, trustee or nominee, or other similar evidence of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. What items of business will be voted on at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The items of business scheduled to be voted on at the Annual Meeting are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to elect nine directors to serve for the next year and until their successors are elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to ratify the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to approve a restatement of the Gilead Sciences, Inc. 2004 Equity Incentive Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of our Named Executive Officers as presented in this Proxy Statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote, on an advisory basis, as to the frequency with which executive compensation will be subject to future advisory stockholder votes;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote on a stockholder proposal, if properly presented at the meeting, requesting that the Board take steps to permit stockholder action by written consent; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote on a stockholder proposal, if properly presented at the meeting, requesting that the Board adopt a policy that the Chairman of the Board of Directors be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also consider any other business that properly comes before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See question 11, Could other matters be ecided at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. How does the Board recommend that I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recommends that you vote your shares:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR each of the named nominees to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval of a restatement of the Gilead Sciences, Inc. 2004 Equity Incentive Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our Named Executive Officers as presented in this Proxy Statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the choice of every 1 YEAR as the frequency with which executive compensation will be subject to future advisory stockholder votes;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AGAINST the stockholder proposal requesting that the Board take steps to permit stockholder action by written consent; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AGAINST the stockholder proposal requesting that the Board adopt a policy that the Chairman of the Board of Directors be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. What are the voting requirements to elect the directors and to approve each of the proposals discussed in this Proxy Statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum of stockholders is necessary to hold a valid meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum will be present if a majority of the outstanding shares is represented by votes present at the meeting in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by proxies marked abstain and broker non-votes are counted in determining whether a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote is a proxy submitted by a broker that does not indicate a vote for some of the proposals because the broker does not have discretionary voting authority on certain types of proposals and has not received instructions from its client as to how to vote on a particular proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal    Vote Required Proposal 1  Election of nine directors to serve for the next year and until their successors are elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority of votes cast (number of shares voted for a director must exceed the number of shares voted against that director) Proposal 2  Ratification of the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority of the shares entitled to vote and present in person or represented by proxy Proposal 3  Approval of a restatement of the Gilead Sciences, Inc. 2004 Equity Incentive Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority of the shares entitled to vote and present in person or represented by proxy Proposal 4  Approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our Named Executive Officers as presented in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority of the shares entitled to vote and present in person or represented by proxy Proposal 5  Approval, on an advisory basis, as to the frequency of future advisory shareholder votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The frequency that receives the most votes cast will be considered the recommendation of stockholders Proposal 6  Vote on a stockholder proposal, if properly presented at the meeting, requesting that the Board take steps to permit stockholder action by written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority of the shares entitled to vote and present in person or represented by proxy Proposal 7  Vote on a stockholder proposal, if properly presented at the meeting, requesting that the Board adopt a policy that the Chairman of the Board of Directors be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority of the shares entitled to vote and present in person or represented by proxy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held by a broker and you do not indicate how you wish to vote, your broker is permitted to exercise its discretion to vote your shares only on certain routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2 is a routine matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, your broker is permitted to exercise discretionary voting authority to vote your shares for this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker may not exercise discretionary voting authority and may not vote your shares with respect to the other proposals unless you provide your broker with voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal 1, abstentions will not have an effect on the outcome of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposals 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7 abstentions will have the same effect as an against vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will have no effect on Proposals 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8. How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote in person by attending the meeting or by completing and returning a proxy by mail, by telephone or electronically, using the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with Gileads transfer agent, Computershare, you are considered a stockholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a stock brokerage account or by a bank or other nominee, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most beneficial owners whose stock is held in the name of a bank, broker or other nominee receive instructions for how to vote their shares from their banks, brokers or other nominees, rather than our proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote your shares held through a bank, broker or other nominee by following the voting instructions sent to you by that institution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By mail
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote your proxy by mail, be sure to complete, sign and date the proxy card (if you request one) or voting instruction card that may be delivered to you and return it in the envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will vote your shares as directed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if you return your signed proxy card but do not indicate your voting preferences, the persons named on the proxy card will vote the shares represented by that proxy as recommended by our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Internet or telephone
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may also vote their shares using the Internet or telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The law of the State of Delaware, under which we are incorporated, specifically permits electronically transmitted proxies so long as each such proxy contains or is submitted with information from which the inspector of election can determine that such proxy was authorized by the stockholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Internet and telephone voting procedures below are designed to authenticate stockholders identities, to allow stockholders to vote their shares and to confirm that stockholders instructions have been recorded properly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders voting shares via the Internet should understand that there may be costs associated with electronic access, such as usage charges from Internet access providers and telephone companies, which must be borne by the stockholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record may go to http://www.proxyvote.com to vote their shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be required to provide the control number printed on your Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The votes represented by such proxy will be generated on the computer screen and the voter will be prompted to submit or revise them as desired.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record using a touch-tone telephone may vote their shares by calling (800) 690-6903 and following the recorded instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A number of brokers and banks are participating in a program that offers the ability to vote shares over the telephone and Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street name holders may vote on the Internet by accessing http://www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be required to provide the control number printed on your Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street name holders using a touch-tone telephone may vote their shares by calling (800) 454-8683 and following the recorded instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet and telephone voting for stockholders of record and street name holders will be available 24 hours a day, and will close at 11:59 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time on May 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting your proxy via the Internet or by telephone will not affect your right to vote in person should you decide to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In person at the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record may vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not a stockholder plans to attend the meeting, the stockholder should vote by mail, Internet or telephone to ensure his or her vote is counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder may still attend the meeting and vote in person if he or she has already voted by one of these methods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote in person, a stockholder may come to the Annual Meeting and we will provide the stockholder with a ballot when he or she arrives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ballot submitted at the meeting would supersede any prior vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares, you must obtain a legal proxy from your bank, broker or other nominee and present it to the nspector of election with your ballot to be able to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can save us the expense of a second mailing of proxy materials by voting promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9. What can I do if I change my mind after I vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder giving a proxy pursuant to this solicitation has the power to revoke it at any time before the shares are voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you can revoke your proxy before it is exercised by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: submitting a written notice to our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices, 333 Lakeside Drive, Foster City, California 94404;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: submitting a valid, later-dated proxy or a later-dated vote by telephone or on the Internet; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting by ballot at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares, you may revoke your proxy or submit new voting instructions by contacting your bank, broke or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also vote in person at the Annual Meeting as described in the answer to the preceding question.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the meeting will not, by itself, revoke a proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares for which proxies have been properly submitted and not revoked will be voted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10. What is the deadline for voting my shares by proxy, via the Internet or by telephone?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes by proxy must be received before the polls close at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes submitted via the Internet or by telephone must be received by 11:59 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time on May 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 11. Could other matters be decided at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the date this Proxy Statement went to press, we did not know of any matters to be raised at the Annual Meeting other than those referred to in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If other matters are properly presented at the Annual Meeting for consideration and you execute and deliver a proxy, then John C. Martin and John F. Milligan, the persons named on your proxy card, will have the discretion to vote on those matters for you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12. Is my vote confidential?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy cards, ballots and voting tabulations that identify stockholders by name are kept confidential.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are exceptions for contested proxy solicitations or when necessary to meet legal requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Veaco Group, the independent proxy tabulator that we have engaged, will count the votes and act as the inspector of election for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 13. Where can I find the voting results of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will announce preliminary voting results at the Annual Meeting and publish final results in a Current Report on Form 8-K within four business days after the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 14. Who will pay for the cost of this proxy solicitation?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will pay the cost of soliciting proxies, including preparation, assembly, printing and mailing of the Notice and this Proxy Statement and any additional information furnished to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Copies of solicitation materials will be furnished to banks, brokerage houses, fiduciaries and custodians holding in their names shares of our common stock beneficially owned by others to forward to such beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may reimburse persons representing beneficial owners of common stock for their out-of-pocket expenses for forwarding solicitation materials to such beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have hired Innisfree M&A Incorporated to act as our proxy solicitor in conjunction with the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will pay Innisfree M&A Incorporated a fee of $15,000, plus reasonable out-of-pocket expenses, for these services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our solicitation of proxies by mail may be supplemented by telephone, facsimile, electronic mail or personal solicitation by directors, officers or other of our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No additional compensation will be paid to directors, officers or other employees for such solicitation services performed by them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 15. When are the stockholder proposals or nominations for Gileads 2018 annual meeting of stockholders due?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may submit proposals for consideration at future stockholder meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a stockholder proposal to be considered for inclusion in our Proxy Statement for the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders pursuant to SEC Rule 14a-8, the Corporate Secretary must receive the written proposal at our principal executive offices no later than November 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such proposals also must comply with SEC regulations under Rule 14a-8 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the Exchange Act), regarding the inclusion of stockholder proposals in company proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals should be addressed to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Secretary Gilead Sciences, Inc. 333 Lakeside Drive Foster City, California 94404
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder (or a group of up to 20 stockholders) who has owned at least three percent of our shares continuously for at least three years and has complied with the other requirements in our bylaws may nominate and include in our proxy materials director nominees constituting up to 20% of our Board or two persons,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whichever is greater.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Written notice of a proxy access nomination for inclusion in our Proxy Statement for the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders must be received by the Corporate Secretary at the address above:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: not earlier than the open of business on October 28, 2017; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: not later than the close of business on November 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders wishing to submit proposals that are not to be included in our Proxy Statement pursuant to Rule 14a-8 or to nominate director candidates who are not included in our Proxy Statement pursuant to the proxy access provisions in our bylaws must give timely written notice of such proposals or nominations to the Corporate Secretary at the address above in accordance with our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be timely within the meaning of Rule 14a-4(c) under the Exchange Act, written notice must be received by the Corporate Secretary:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: not earlier than the open of business on January 10, 2018; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: not later than the close of business on February 9, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairperson of our annual meeting has the sole authority to determine whether any nomination or other business has been properly brought before the meeting in accordance with our bylaws and to declare that any such nomination or other business not properly brought before our annual meeting shall not be transacted, and we may exercise discretionary voting authority to vote any shares for which we receive proxies as we determine appropriate.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are nine nominees for the Board positions presently authorized.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies cannot be voted for a greater number of persons than the number of nominees standing for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected by a majority of the votes cast (number of shares voted for a director must exceed the number of shares voted against that director) with respect to the election of each director at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director who is elected will hold office until the next annual meeting of stockholders and until his or her successor is elected and qualified, or until such directors earlier death, resignation or removal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each nominee listed below is currently a director of Gilead and, other than Kelly A. Kramer, was previously elected by the stockholders at the 2016 annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Kramer was recommended for consideration by our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee by a third-party search firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John W. Madigan is retiring effective at the Annual Meeting, and our Board size will be reduced from ten to nine positions effective at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by executed proxies will be voted for or against the election of the nine nominees named below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that any nominee should be unavailable for election as a result of an unexpected occurrence, such shares will be voted for the election of such substitute nominee as our Board may propose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each person nominated for election has agreed to serve if elected and our Board and management have no reason to believe that any nominee will be unable to serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee recommended each of the nominees listed below to our Board for nomination Each member of our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee meets the criteria of independent director as specified by applicable laws and regulations of the SEC, the listing rules of NASDAQ and our Board Guidelines, as determined affirmatively by our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Vote Standard for Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws require directors to be elected by the majority of the votes cast with respect to such director in uncontested elections (number of shares voted for a director must exceed the number of shares voted against that director).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In a contested election (a situation in which the number of nominees for director exceeds the number of directors to be elected), the standard for election of directors will be a plurality of the shares voting in the election of directors at any such meeting at which a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Board Guidelines, any director who fails to receive at least a majority of the votes cast in an uncontested election must tender his or her resignation to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee would then evaluate the tendered resignation and make a recommendation to our Board to accept or reject the resignation or to take other action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board will act on our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees recommendation and publicly disclose its decision and the rationale for such decision within 90 days from the date the election results are certified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director who tenders his or her resignation will not participate in our Boards decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee who was not already serving as a director does not receive at least a majority of the votes cast for such director at the annual meeting, that nominee will not become a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted certain corporate governance principles, which we refer to as our Board Guidelines, to promote the functioning of the Board and its committees and the interests of stockholders and to set forth a common set of expectations as to how the Board, its various committees and individual directors should perform their functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Guidelines are available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR EACH NAMED NOMINEE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has evaluated and recommended, and the full Board has considered and nominated for election at the Annual Meeting, each of the nine directors described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The names of the nominees in alphabetical order and certain information about them as of March 27, 2017, as well as the specific experience, qualifications, attributes or skills of the director nominees that led our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee to conclude that the nominee should serve as a director of Gilead, are set forth below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John F. Cogan, Ph.D., age 69, joined our Board in 2005 and was appointed Lead Independent Director in May 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Cogan is currently the Leonard and Shirley Ely Senior Fellow at the Hoover Institution at Stanford University, where he has had a continuing appointment since 1980.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Composition, Leadership and Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NASDAQ listing rules require that a majority of the members of a listed companys board of directors qualify as independent as affirmatively determined by our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Board Guidelines require that a substantial majority of our Board consist of independent directors as defined by the Board Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Guidelines are available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After review of all relevant transactions and relationships between each director, and his or her family members, and us, our senior management and independent registered public accounting firm, our Board has determined that seven of our nine nominees for director, as well as our retiring director, Mr. Madigan, are independent directors as specified by applicable laws and regulations of the SEC, the listing rules of NASDAQ and our Board Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Martin, our Executive Chairman, and Dr. Milligan, our President and Chief Executive Officer, are not independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has chosen to separate the roles of Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Milligan is our President and Chief Executive Officer and Dr. Martin is our Chairman of the Board and Executive Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As President and Chief Executive Officer, Dr. Milligan is responsible for day-to-day management of the company and the overall execution of our strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Executive Chairman, Dr. Martins primary responsibilities include coordinating the activities of our Board with our lead independent director and working with external stakeholders, including academic thought leaders and government agencies, and individuals across the organization on opportunities for continued innovation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that, given the proven leadership capabilities, breadth of industry experience and business success of both Drs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Milligan and Martin, Gilead is best served by this leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Martin has served as Chairman of the Board since May 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Guidelines provide that the independent directors will designate a lead independent director when the Chairman is an employee of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Cogan has served as the lead independent director since May 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our current Board leadership structure provides effective oversight of management and strong leadership of the ndependent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The defined role of lead independent director at Gilead is closely aligned with the role of an independent Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Lead Independent Director Charter, the lead independent director has clearly delineated and comprehensive duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presiding at meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serving as principal liaison between the independent directors and the Chairman and between the independent directors and senior management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving information sent to the Board and its committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving agendas for the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving meeting schedules to ensure there is sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: calling meetings of the independent directors when necessary and appropriate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: responding directly to stockholder and other stakeholder questions and comments that are directed to the lead independent director or to the independent directors as a group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: advising the Board and the Board committees on the retention of advisers and consultants to report directly to the Board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: communicating to management, as appropriate, the results of private discussions among independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as required by our Board Guidelines, Gileads independent directors meet without executive management on a routine basis to review, among other things, Gileads strategy, performance, management effectiveness and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to his role as lead independent director, Dr. Cogan is a member of the Audit Committee and the Scientific Committee and frequently attends meetings of other Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Dr. Cogan conducts an annual assessment of the Board and committees of the Board to evaluate their effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director Charter is available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversight of Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has delegated oversight of certain risks to relevant committees:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee reviews risks associated with our financial and accounting systems, accounting policies and investment strategies, in addition to regulatory compliance and other matters that have
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: significant elements of risk associated with them, including Gileads information technology security programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee regularly meets in executive session and in private sessions with Gileads independent registered public accounting firm, our Vice President of Internal Audit and the Chief Financial Officer to discuss, among other things, risks to Gileads business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee evaluates Gileads compensation policies and practices to help ensure that these policies and practices do not incentivize employees to take risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on Gilead.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews our management of risks in areas such as regulatory, clinical trials, manufacturing, product promotion and human resources and meets periodically with senior employees of Gilead responsible for managing risk in these areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the committees periodically reports to the Board of Directors on its risk oversight activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to receiving reports from our Board committees, our Board of Directors periodically reviews Gileads management of specific material risks or legal developments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our Boards leadership structure effectively supports the Boards independent evaluation and management of risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required under applicable NASDAQ listing rules, our independent directors meet in regularly scheduled executive sessions at which only they are present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Cogan, our lead independent director, presides over these executive sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, executive sessions may be convened by the lead independent director at his discretion and will be convened if requested by any other independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meetings of our Board of Directors and Board Committees; Attendance at Annual Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has an Audit Committee, a Compensation Committee, a Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and a Scientific Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors attended at least 75% of the aggregate of all meetings of our Board and of the committees on which they served during the year ended December 31, 2016 (or the period for which they served).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Current committee membership and the number of meetings of our full Board and committees held in 2016 are shown in the table below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committees of our Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee is composed of five directors and operates under a written charter adopted by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that all members of our Audit Committee are independent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: directors under the criteria specified by applicable laws and regulations of the SEC, the listing rules of NASDAQ and our Board Guidelines, including the heightened independence standards under Exchange Act Rule 10A-3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that Mr. Moore, Ms. Kramer and Mr. Madigan each qualify as an audit committee financial expert, as defined in applicable SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee oversees, on behalf of our Board, our corporate accounting, financial reporting process and systems of internal accounting and financial controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is directly responsible for the selection, appointment, retention, compensation, oversight and, where appropriate, the replacement of the independent registered public accounting firm (the auditors);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approves the engagement of proposed audit, review and attest services, as well as permissible non-attest services by our auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluates the performance, independence and qualifications of the auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews periodic reports prepared by the auditors regarding the auditors internal quality control procedures and any material issues raised by internal quality-control reviews or by inquiries or investigations by governmental or professional authorities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitors the rotation of audit partners on our engagement team and is involved in the selection of the lead audit partner
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meets with the auditors and our financial management to review the scope and cost of proposed audits and the audit procedures to be utilized, and, following the conclusion thereof, reviews the results of such audits, including any findings, comments or recommendations of the auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discusses with the auditors and our financial and accounting management the scope, adequacy and effectiveness of our interna control over financial reporting, including the adequacy of the systems of reporting to our Audit Committee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews the potential effect of regulatory and accounting developments on our consolidated financial statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews significant reporting issues or judgments made in connection with the preparation of our consolidated financial statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews and approves, in advance, or ratifies all related party transactions in accordance with applicable laws, SEC rules and NASDAQ requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees the establishment and maintenance of disclosure controls and procedures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews draft earnings releases and the financial statements to be included in our Annual Reports on Form 10-K and Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q, including the results of the annual audit and the results of the auditors review of our quarterly condensed consolidated financial statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meets with internal audit management to review and approve the annual internal audit plan and budget and to review the results of internal audit activities; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees our management of risks associated with financial and accounting systems, accounting policies, public reporting, investment strategies and cybersecurity, including the periodic review with management of our efforts to identify and mitigate such risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee has established procedures for the confidential submission of employee concerns regarding accounting, interna accounting controls or auditing matters under the Complaint Procedure and Non-Retaliation Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee receives quarterly reports from management on all complaints made under our Complaint Procedure and Non-Retaliation Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee also holds separate private sessions, during its regularly scheduled meetings, with each of Gileads Chief Financial Officer and representatives of Ernst & Young LLP, and from time to time,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gileads General Counsel, Corporate Controller and Vice President of Internal Audit, at which candid discussions regarding financial management, legal, accounting, auditing and internal control issues take place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Charter is available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that all members of our Compensation Committee are independent directors under the criteria specified by applicable laws and regulations of the SEC, the listing rules of NASDAQ and our Board Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of our Compensation Committee are outside directors as determined under Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code and non-employee directors as determined under Rule 16b-3 under the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee has overall responsibility for approving and evaluating our executive officer compensation plans, policies and programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: taking any and all actions which may be taken by the Board with respect to the compensation level of our executive officers, including but not limited to the development of compensation policies and the review of compensation arrangements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: overseeing the administration and review of our compensation plans, including our 2004 Equity Incentive Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, corporate bonus plan, deferred compensation program and our Internal Revenue Code Section 162(m) Bonus Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluating the performance of Dr. Milligan, our President and Chief Executive Officer, and Dr. Martin, our Executive Chairman, and reviewing and approving their compensation, subject to ratification by the independent directors of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and approving the compensation arrangements for our other executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: establishing the stock ownership guidelines applicable to executive officers and recommending stock ownership guidelines applicable to the non-employee Board members;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and discussing the Compensation Discussion and Analysis included in our Proxy Statement for each annual meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing the results of the most recent stockholder advisory vote on executive compensation and overseeing our submissions to stockholders on executive compensation matters; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: appointing, determining the compensation of and overseeing the independent compensation advisers retained by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee operates pursuant to a charter that outlines its specific authority, duties and responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee Charter is available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee has the authority to engage the services of its own outside advisors to assist it in determining the compensation of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee has retained Frederic W. Cook & Co. (FW Cook), a national compensation consulting firm, as its independent compensation consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cook reports directly to our Compensation Committee and provides various executive compensation services to our Compensation Committee, including advising the Committee on the following matters:

sentences.text: Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that all members of our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee are independent directors under the criteria specified by applicable laws and regulations of the SEC, the listing rules of NASDAQ and our Board Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee performs several functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: develops and periodically reviews the desired qualifications of members of the Board and its committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determines the need for new directors and, as appropriate, leads the search for new individuals qualified to become members of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recommends director nominees to the Board to be presented for stockholder approval at the annual meeting of stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews the Boards committee structure and recommends directors to serve as members and chairpersons of each committee for the Boards approval;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determines on an annual basis the members of the Board who meet the independence requirements and members of the Audit Committee who meet the financial expert requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews our corporate governance policies and practices and recommends new policies and changes to existing policies for the Boards approval;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: develops an annual self-evaluation process for the Board and its committees and, as appropriate, makes recommendations to the Board regarding its findings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees our management of non-financial or non-compensation policies-related risks; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviews our political expenditure policies and expenditures, including payments to trade associations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In identifying potential director nominees, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee considers Board candidates recommended through a variety of methods and sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These include suggestions from current Board members, senior management, stockholders, professional search firms and other sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews all candidates in he same manner regardless of the source of the recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In evaluating candidates for membership on the Board, our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee considers the candidates relevant experience, the number and nature of other board memberships held and possible conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider whether the candidate assists in achieving a mix of members that represents a diversity of backgrounds and experience, including with respect to age, gender, international background, race and specialized experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each year, our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews its Board membership criteria and assesses the composition of the Board against the criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will also consider all factors it determines appropriate to meeting the needs of the Board at that particular time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to the Board membership criteria
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: established by our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, candidates nominated for election or reelection to the Board should possess the following qualifications:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the highest standards of personal and professional integrity;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the ability and judgment to serve the long-term interest of our stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: experience and expertise relevant to our business and which will contribute to the overall effectiveness and diversity of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: broad business and social perspective;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the ability to communicate openly with other directors and to meaningfully and civilly participate in the Boards decision making process;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: commitment to serve on the Board for an extended period of time to ensure continuity and to develop knowledge about our business and willingness to devote appropriate time and effort to fulfilling the duties and responsibilities of a Board member;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: independence from any particular constituency; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the ability and willingness to objectively appraise the performance of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the policy of our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee to consider properly submitted stockholder recommendations of new director candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees evaluation process for director nominees does not vary based on whether a candidate is recommended by a stockholder or the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder recommendation must include the candidates name and qualifications for Board membership, the candidates age, business address, residence address, principal occupation or employment, the number of shares beneficially owned by the candidate and all other information that would be required to solicit a proxy under federal securities law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the recommendation must include the stockholders name, address and the number of shares beneficially owned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendation should be sent to the Corporate Secretary, Gilead Sciences, Inc., 333 Lakeside Drive, Foster City, California 94404.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendation must be delivered to the Corporate Secretary prior to the same deadline for director nominations not for inclusion in the proxy materials, as described under question 15 in Questions and Answers above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee Charter is available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
