sentences.text: Gregg H. Alton, age 51, is our Executive Vice President, Corporate and Medical Affairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alton joined us in 1999, and served as General Counsel from 2000 to 2009, when he was appointed to his current position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In his current role, Mr. Alton is responsible for legal affairs, government affairs, medical affairs, public affairs and emerging market activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Gilead, Mr. Alton was an attorney at the law firm of Cooley Godward, LLP, where he specialized in mergers and acquisitions, corporate partnerships and corporate finance transactions for healthcare and information technology companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alton is a member of the boards of the AIDS Institute, the Boys and Girls Clubs of Oakland and Celladon Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also a member of the U.S. Governments Industry Trade Advisory Committee on Intellectual Property Rights, the advisory boards of UCSF Global Health Sciences, USC Schaeffer Center for Health Policy and Economics, Pharmozyme, Inc. and the Deans Advisory Council at Stanford Law School.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, he serves on Partners In Healths Board of Trustees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alton received a bachelors degree in legal studies from the University of California at Berkeley, and holds a JD from Stanford University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Norbert W. Bischofberger, Ph.D., age 61, is our Executive Vice President, Research and Development and Chief Scientific Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Bischofberger joined Gilead in 1990 and has served as Executive Vice President, Research and Development since 2000 and Chief Scientific Officer since 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Gilead, Dr. Bischofberger was a Senior Scientist in Genentech, Inc.s DNA Synthesis group from 1986 to 1990.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He received his Ph.D. in Organic Chemistry at the Eidgenossische Technische Hochschule (ETH) in Zurich, Switzerland and performed postdoctoral research in steroid chemistry at Syntex.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also performed additional research in organic chemistry and applied enzymology in Professor George Whitesides lab at Harvard University in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James R. Meyers, age 52, joined Gilead in 1996 and was appointed to his current role of Executive Vice President, Worldwide Commercial Operations, in November 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this role, he is responsible for commercial activities in North America, Europe, Middle East, Australia and Japan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Meyers began his career at Gilead as a regional sales director, and subsequently held leadership positions within the U.S. and North American Commercial Operations organization before being appointed Senior Vice President of North American Commercial Operations in 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to Gilead, he held positions of increasing responsibility in sales, training, marketing and management with Zeneca Pharmaceuticals and Astra USA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Meyers is a member of the boards of the Biotechnology Innovation Organization (BIO) and the California Life Sciences Association.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He received his Bachelors degree in economics from Boston College.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Robin L. Washington, age 54, is our Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Washington joined us in 2008 and oversees our global finance and information technology organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Gilead, Ms. Washington was Chief Financial Officer at Hyperion Solutions, which was acquired by Oracle Corporation in 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She previously served in a number of executive positions with PeopleSoft, most recently in the role of Senior Vice President and Corporate Controller.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Washington is a member of the Board of Directors of Honeywell International, the board of directors of Salesforce.com and the board of visitors, Graziadio School of Business and Management, Pepperdine University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She previously served on the board of directors of Tektronix, Inc. (acquired by Danaher) and the board of directors of MIPS Technologies Inc. (acquired by Imagination).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She is a certified public accountant and holds a bachelors degree in business administration from the University of Michigan and an MBA from Pepperdine University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin Young, age 59, joined Gilead Sciences in 2004 and was appointed Chief Operating Officer in May 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as Executive Vice President of Commercial Operations from 2004 through 2014, and from 2014 to 2016 served as senior advisor to the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to Gilead, Mr. Young spent more than 20 years in the biopharmaceutical industry, first with ICI Pharmaceuticals and subsequently with Amgen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During his 12 years at Amgen, he held a number of positions in Europe and the United States, including Head of the U.S. Inflammation Business Unit, leading the re-launch of Enbrel  following the acquisition of Immunex Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Young has undergraduate and graduate degrees in Sports Science and Exercise from Liverpool and Nottingham, England.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2011 he was appointed a Commander of The British Empire, one of Great Britains highest civilian honors, in recognition of his services to the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 2
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RATIFICATION OF THE SELECTION OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee has selected Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017 and has further directed that we submit the selection of our independent registered public accounting firm for ratification by the stockholders at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP has audited our financial statements since our inception in 1987.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Evaluation and Selection of Independent Auditor
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To help ensure continuing auditor independence, our Audit Committee annually reviews Ernst & Young LLPs independence and performance in connection with the Committees determination of whether to retain Ernst & Young LLP or engage another firm as our ndependent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the course of these reviews, our Audit Committee considers, among other things:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLPs historical and recent performance on the Gilead audit
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLPs institutional knowledge and expertise regarding Gileads global business, accounting policies and practices and internal control over financial reporting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the professional qualifications of Ernst & Young LLP, the lead audit partner and other key engagement partners;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLPs disclosures related to audit quality and performance, including recent PCAOB inspections; the appropriateness of Ernst & Young LLPs audit fees, including the fees that Ernst & Young LLP receives for non-audit services;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the quality and candor of Ernst & Young LLPs communications with the Audit Committee and management; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the potential impact of changing our independent registered public amounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this evaluation, our Audit Committee has determined that Ernst & Young LLP is independent and that it is in the best interest of Gilead and its stockholders to continue to retain Ernst  & Young LLP to serve as our independent auditors for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Principal Accountant Fees and Services
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee is responsible for audit firm compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The aggregate fees billed by Ernst & Young LLP for the years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015 for the professional services described below are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Represents fees incurred for the integrated audit of our consolidated financial statements and of our internal control over financial reporting and review of the interim condensed consolidated financial statements, as well as fees incurred for audit services that are normally provided by Ernst & Young LLP in connection with other statutory or regulatory filings or engagements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Represents fees incurred for assurance and related services that are traditionally performed by Ernst & Young LLP, are reasonably related to the performance of the audit or review of our consolidated financial
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: statements and are not reported under Audit Fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These fees included accounting consultation services related to issuance of our senior unsecured notes, implementation of new accounting standards, and fees incurred in connection with specified procedures performed by Ernst & Young LLP in relation to user-defined reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the services described above were pre-approved by our Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee concluded that the provision of these services by Ernst & Young LLP would not affect their independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rotation of Lead Audit Partner
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee requires the lead audit partner to be rotated at least every five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The process for selection of Gileads lead audit partner pursuant to this rotation involves a meeting between the Chair of our Audit Committee and the candidate for the role as well as discussion by the full Audit Committee and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pre-Approval Policy and Procedures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To minimize relationships that could impair the objectivity of Ernst & Young LLP, our Audit Committee adopted policies and procedures for the pre-approval of audit and permissible non-audit services rendered by Ernst & Young LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this policy, our Audit Committee must pre-approve all services provided by Ernst & Young LLP, and the policy prohibits the engagement of Ernst & Young LLP for certain specified services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy permits the engagement of Ernst & Young LLP for services approved by our Audit Committee in defined categories such as audit services, audit-related services and tax services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy also permits engagement of Ernst & Young LLP for other services approved by our Audit Committee if there is a persuasive business reason for using Ernst & Young LLP over other providers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy provides that, as a general rule of thumb, the fees for these other services should be less than 25% of total audit fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pre-approval may be given as part of our Audit Committees approval of the scope of Ernst & Young LLPs engagement or on an explicit case-by-case basis before Ernst & Young LLP is engaged to provide each service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The pre-approval of services may be delegated by our Audit Committee to a member of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee receives quarterly reports on the scope of services provided to date and planned to be provided by Ernst & Young LLP in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Ernst & Young LLP will be present at our Annual Meeting, will have an opportunity to make a statement if they so desire and will be available to respond to appropriate questions from stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder ratification of the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm is not required by our bylaws or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, our Board is submitting the selection of Ernst & Young LLP to the stockholders for ratification as a matter of good corporate practice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the stockholders fail to ratify the selection, our Audit Committee will reconsider whether or not to retain Ernst & Young LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if the selection is ratified, our Audit Committee may direct the appointment of a different independent registered public accounting firm at any time during the year if they determine that such a change would be in the best interests of Gilead and our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the audited consolidated financial statements for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016, the Audit Committee has:

sentences.text: (1) reviewed and discussed the audited consolidated financial statements with management;

sentences.text: (2) discussed with Ernst & Young LLP, Gileads independent registered public accounting firm (the Auditors), the matters required to be discussed with the Audit Committee by Auditing Standard No. 1301, Communications with Audit Committees, issued by the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (the PCAOB); and

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 3
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPROVAL OF A RESTATEMENT OF THE GILEAD SCIENCES, INC. 2004 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are asking stockholders to approve an amendment and restatement (the 2017 Restatement) of our 2004 Equity Incentive Plan the 2004 Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that a comprehensive equity compensation program serves as a necessary and powerful tool to attract, retain and incentivize individuals essential to our financial success and accordingly benefits all of our stockholders by allowing us to retain ndividuals who are expected to make significant contributions to the creation of stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to a number of technical or clarifying changes, the 2017 Restatement revises the 2004 Plan as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Establishes an annual $750,000 limit on the amount of cash that can be paid and value of equity awards that can be granted (based on grant date fair value) as compensation to any non-employee director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increases the maximum number of shares of common stock (shares) that may be issued under the 2017 Restatement by 66,000,000 shares;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eliminates the 2004 Plans cap on the number of shares that can be issued under awards of restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance shares, share-settled performance units and phantom shares (collectively referred to in this Proxy Statement as full value awards) and instead implements what is often referred to as a fungible share counting provision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the fungible share provision, any share issued pursuant to a full value award that is granted after February 28, 2017 will count against the plans aggregate share limit as 2.5 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares issued pursuant to options or stock appreciation rights (SARs) and shares issued pursuant to any awards granted on or before February 28, 2017 will continue to count against the plans aggregate share limit as 1 share for every 1 share issued;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Addresses how various awards are accounted for under the plans aggregate share limit by providing that shares withheld or tendered in satisfaction of any option exercise price or that are covered by but not issued upon exercise of an SAR, and shares withheld or tendered in satisfaction of any tax obligations on options or SARs, will nevertheless count against the aggregate plan limit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares that are withheld or tendered in satisfaction of tax obligations on full value awards do not count against the plans aggregate share limit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifies that any dividends or dividend equivalent rights granted on awards that are subject to vesting requirements may not be paid or settled unless, until and only to the extent that the underlying award vests;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clarifies that Gileads clawback policy applies to any awards under the 2017 Restatement; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Extends the plans term through May 10, 2027.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this proposal also is intended to serve as approval of the material terms of the performance goals under the 2017 Restatement, which will enable Gilead to continue to make awards that are intended to qualify as performance-based compensation under Section 162(m) (Section 162(m)) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the Code), as addressed below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Share Reserve Under the 2017 Restatement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, the 2017 Restatement would increase the number of shares authorized for issuance under the 2004 Plan by 66,000,000 shares, increasing the limit on the aggregate number of shares issuable over the life of the plan to 309,188,366 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, if the 2017 Restatement is approved by stockholders, the maximum number of shares that could be issued under the 2004 Plan after February 28, 2017 (including to satisfy awards that were outstanding on that date) would be 118,749,786 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of the fungible share provision and other share counting provisions addressed above, the actual number of shares issued under the plan could be lower.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of our Compensation Committees recommendation to the Board of Directors to approve the 2017 Restatement, including the total number of shares available for issuance under the plan, the elimination of the full value award sublimit, and the shift to a fungible share reserve, the Compensation Committee solicited advice from its independent compensation consultant, Frederic W. Cook & Co., analyzed Gileads historical burn rate, anticipated future equity award needs, and the dilutive impact of the changes to the 2004 Plans share reserve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, the Compensation Committee considered:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares Remaining Available Under the 2004 Plan: As of February 28, 2017, a total of 36,527,957 shares were subject to outstanding awards under the 2004 Plan and a total of 52,749,786 shares remained available for issuance pursuant to awards that could be granted after that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our stockholders do not approve the 2017 Restatement, we anticipate that we could cease to have sufficient shares available for new full value awards within a year or two.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Historical Burn Rate: Our equity plan share usage over 2014, 2015, and 2016 represented a three-year average adjusted gross burn rate of 1.04%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is below the median average burn rate of our peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dilution: Dilution is commonly measured by overhang, which generally refers to the amount of potential dilution to current stockholders that could result from the future issuance of the shares reserved under an equity compensation plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overhang is typically expressed as a percentage (equal to a fraction where the numerator is the sum of the number of shares reserved but not issued under equity compensation plans plus the number of shares subject to outstanding awards and the denominator is the sum of the numerator plus the total number of shares outstanding).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the 2017 Restatement is approved, our voting power dilution will be approximately 11.9% as of February 28, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table below summarizes, as of February 28, 2017, the remaining share reserve, the number of shares subject to outstanding awards, the weighted average exercise price of those awards and the weighted average remaining contractual term of outstanding awards, in each case under the 2004 Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All share numbers that appear in this proposal, including in the below table, reflect the two-for-one stock split of the Gileads common stock that was completed on January 25, 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares Available for Future Grant    Shares Subject to Outstanding Awards   Number of Shares    Number of Shares     Weighted Average Exercise Price     Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term  52,749,786     36,527,957    $ 42.89      4.87 years   (1) (2) (3)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Includes 12,501,899 shares of our common stock subject to performance share awards (assuming target performance) that will vest and become issuable upon the attainment of the designated performance objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28, 2017, a total of 11,580,064 restricted stock units, 921,835 performance share units and 24,026,058 stock options were outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Promotion of Good Governance Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have incorporated a number of provisions in the 2017 Restatement to protect stockholders and reflect corporate governance best practices, including the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement continues to prohibit the repricing of stock options and stock appreciation rights without stockholder approval and clarifies that in-the-money awards may not be cancelled or exchanged for any payment or other award, except in a change in control transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards under the 2017 Restatement continue to be subject to a maximum term of ten years and options and stock appreciation rights may not be granted at a discount to the fair market value of our common stock on the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement reduces the annual limit on compensation that may be provided to our non-employee directors from $1,000,000 to $750,000 and extends this limitation to all cash and equity awards provided to non-employee directors, whether granted under the 2017 Restatement or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except with respect to a maximum of 5% of the number of Shares authorized for issuance under the 2017 Restatement, no time- based awards of restricted stock or restricted stock units may provide for vesting at a rate more rapid than annual pro rata vesting over a three-year period, and any awards of restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance shares or performance units which provide for vesting upon the attainment of performance goals may provide for a performance period of at least 12 months, subject to limited exceptions specified in the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement provides that dividends and dividend equivalent rights may never be paid on any unvested award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement incorporates Gileads clawback policy, under which our Board has the authority to recoup any bonus or other cash or equity compensation paid on the basis of financial results that are subsequently restated from any executive officer or other covered individual whose misconduct contributed to an obligation to file the financial restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement prohibits liberal share recycling on option and SAR awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) of the Code
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement, if approved by our stockholders, will allow us to continue to structure future awards under the plan so that hey qualify as performance-based compensation not subject to the $1,000,000 per-person limitation on the income tax deductibility of ompensation paid to certain of our executive officers that would otherwise be imposed under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, under Section 162(m), in order for our company to be able to deduct compensation in excess of $1,000,000 paid in any one year to the companys Chief Executive Officer or any of the companys three other most highly compensated executive officers (other than the companys Chief Financial Officer), such compensation must qualify as performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the requirements of performance-based compensation for purposes of Section 162(m) is that the material terms of the performance goals under which compensation may be paid be disclosed to and approved by the companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of Section 162(m), the material terms include
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the employees eligible to receive compensation,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a description of the business criteria on which the performance goal is based and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the maximum amount of compensation that can be paid to an employee under the performance goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the various types of awards under the 2017 Restatement, each of these aspects is discussed below, and stockholder approval of the 2017 Restatement will be deemed to constitute approval of each of these aspects of the 2017 Restatement for purposes of the approval requirements of Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although stockholder approval is one of the requirements for exemption under Section 162(m), even with stockholder approval there can be no guarantee that compensation will be treated as exempt performance-based compensation under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, our Compensation Committee will continue to have the authority to provide compensation that is not exempt from the limits on deductibility under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of the key provisions of the 2017 Restatement, but such summary does not purport to be a complete description of all the provisions of the 2017 Restatement and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the provisions of the 2017 Restatement, which is attached hereto as Appendix A. Stockholders are encouraged to read the 2017 Restatement in its entirety.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan Effective Date:    The 2017 Restatement will become effective upon approval by our stockholders  Plan Termination Date:   May 10, 2027  Eligible Participants:    Executive officers and other employees, non-employee Board members and consultants in our employ or service or the employ or service of our subsidiaries or other related entities  Aggregate Shares Authorized for Issuance under Plan:    An additional 66,000,000 shares for an aggregate total of 309,188,366 shares  Shares Authorized as a Percent of Common Stock Outstanding on February 28, 2017 :    23.7%  Share Counting Provisions:    Shares issued pursuant to full value awards granted after February 28, 2017 will count against the aggregate plan limit as 2.5 shares for every 1 share issued.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares issued pursuant to any awards granted on or before February 28, 2017 as well as awards of options or SARs granted after February 28, 2017 will count against the aggregate plan limit as 1 share for every 1 share issued.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Award Types        Incentive stock options     Non-statutory stock options     Stock appreciation rights     Restricted stock     Restricted stock units     Performance shares     Performance units     Phantom shares     Dividend equivalent rights  Grant Limits Per Person Per Calendar Year:        A maximum of 5,000,000 shares subject to stock options     A maximum of 2,000,000 shares subject to restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance shares, performance units, phantom shares stock appreciation rights, or dividend equivalent rights     The maximum value of all awards denominated in dollars (as opposed to shares) is limited to $10,000,000 assuming the maximum level of performance is achieved for the award  Limits on Awards to Non-Employee Directors Per Calendar Year:      $750,000 annual limit on cash compensation earned by and equity awards granted (based on grant date fair value) to any non-employee director, whether provided under the 2017 Restatement or otherwise     (1) (2) (3)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A participant may be granted options to purchase up to an additional 2,000,000 in the calendar year in which his or her hire or promotion date occurs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A participant may be granted restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance shares, performance units, stock appreciation rights, phantom shares or dividend equivalent rights for up to an additional 400,000 shares in the calendar year in which his or her hire or promotion date occurs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers and other employees, non-employee members of our Board and consultants in our employ or service or in the employ or service of our parent or subsidiaries (whether now existing or subsequently established) or other related entities are eligible to receive awards under the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28, 2017, approximately 8,095 employees (including seven executive officers) and eight non-employee Board members were eligible to participate in the 2004 Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Share Reserve
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An aggregate maximum of 309,188,366 shares may be issued under the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, shares issued pursuant to full value awards granted after February 28, 2017 will count against the aggregate plan limit as 2.5 shares for every 1 share issued and shares issued pursuant to any awards granted on or before February 28, 2017 as well as awards of options or SARs granted after February 28, 2017 will count against the aggregate plan limit as 1 share for every 1 share issued.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum number of shares of common stock that may be issued from the available share reserve pursuant to tax-favored incentive stock options that are granted under the 2017 Restatement after December 31, 2012 will be limited to 195,325,853 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares of common stock issuable under the 2017 Restatement may be drawn from shares of our authorized or unissued shares or from shares reacquired by us, including shares repurchased on the open market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares subject to any outstanding options or other awards under the plan that are forfeited, canceled or expire are deemed not to have been issued for purposes of determining the maximum number of shares which may be issued in the aggregate under the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unvested shares that are forfeited or repurchased by us at the lower of their original purchase price or their fair market value at the time of repurchase will become available for future grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, should the exercise price of an option or SAR be paid with shares of common stock, the authorized reserve under the 2017 Restatement will be reduced by the gross number of shares for which that option or SAR is exercised, and not by the net number of shares issued under the exercised stock option or SAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, should shares otherwise issuable under the 2017 Restatement be withheld in satisfaction of the withholding taxes incurred in connection with the exercise or settlement of an option or SAR, then the number of shares available for issuance under the 2017 Restatement will be reduced by the gross number of shares issuable under such award, calculated prior to such share withholding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, should shares otherwise issuable under the 2017 Restatement be withheld or tendered in satisfaction of withholding taxes incurred in connection with the grant, exercise, vesting or settlement of an award other than an option or SAR, then the number of shares available for issuance under the 2017 Restatement will not be reduced by the number of shares so withheld and such shares will be available for future issuance under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual Limitations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As indicated in the chart above, there are limitations on the maximum number of shares for which any one participant may be granted stock options or other stock awards under the plan per calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No participant may receive stock options for more than 5,000,000 shares of common stock in any one calendar year (or for more
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: than 7,000,000 shares in the calendar year of hire or promotion).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No participant may be awarded restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance shares, performance units (to the extent settled in shares of common stock), stock appreciation rights or phantom shares covering more than 2,000,000 shares in the aggregate in any one calendar year (or for more than 2,400,000 shares in the calendar year of hire or promotion).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the limitations on the maximum number of shares for which awards may be made to any participant under the plan per calendar year, there is also a limit on the maximum dollar value of cash-denominated awards that a participant may be granted under the plan per calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No participant may be awarded cash-denominated awards of more than $10,000,000 U.S. dollars in the aggregate in any single calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program does not currently include the grant of cash-denominated awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement also includes an additional $750,000 limitation on the cash compensation that may be earned by and equity awards that may be granted (based on grant date fair value) to any non-employee director in any single calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This limitation applies to both continuing non-employee Board members and newly-appointed or elected non-employee Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash compensation is counted toward this limit in the year earned (regardless of whether deferred) and any interest or other earnings on such compensation shall not count towards the limit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee serves as the primary administrator of the 2017 Restatement and has the exclusive authority to administer the 2017 Restatement with respect to our executive officers and the non-employee members of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, our Board may administer the 2017 Restatement with respect to eligible individuals other than executive officers and non-employee Board members and may also authorize one or more Board committees or one or more of our officers to make awards under the 2017 Restatement to those eligible individuals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term Plan Administrator, as used in this summary, means our Compensation Committee, our Board, any other committee of our Board and any officer or officers granted administrative authority under the 2017 Restatement, to the extent each such entity or person is acting within the scope of such persons or entitys administrative jurisdiction under the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator has the discretion to select the eligible individuals to whom awards are to be granted and the terms and conditions of each award, including the number of shares of common stock underlying the award or the dollar amount of any cash award made under the plan, the vesting schedule in effect for the award (including any applicable performance goals), the issuance schedule for the shares to be issued in settlement of the award, the maximum term of the award and the provisions for satisfying the applicable withholding taxes upon the exercise, vesting or settlement of the award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Restatement provides for the following types of awards: incentive stock options, non-statutory stock options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance units, performance shares, phantom shares and dividend equivalent rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, dividend equivalent rights may not be awarded with respect to shares of our common stock subject to outstanding stock options or stock appreciations rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards under the 2017 Restatement may vest upon the completion of a designated service period and/or the attainment of pre-established performance goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal features of the various types of awards authorized under the 2017 Restatement may be summarized as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The exercise price of stock options may not be less than the fair market value of our common stock on the grant date, and no stock option may have a term in excess of ten years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The granted option will generally become exercisable in one or more installments over a specified period of service measured from the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment of the exercise price may be made in cash or in shares of our common stock, including a net issuance using shares otherwise purchasable under the option to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: pay the exercise price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option may also be exercised through a broker-dealer sale and remittance procedure pursuant to which the optionee affects a same-day exercise of the option and sale of the purchased shares in order to cover the exercise price for the purchased shares and the applicable withholding taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Appreciation Rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stock appreciation right will allow the holder to exercise that right as to a specific number of shares of common stock and receive in exchange an appreciation distribution from us in an amount equal to the excess of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the fair market value of the shares of common stock as to which the stock appreciation right is exercised over
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the aggregate base price in effect for those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The base price per share may not be less than the fair market value per share of the common stock on the date the stock appreciation right is granted, and the right may not have a term in excess of ten years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The distribution may be made in cash or in shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator may make awards of unvested shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator will determine the vesting schedule of those shares at the time of the award (including any performance-vesting requirements), the amount of consideration to be paid, if any, for the restricted stock and the form in which such consideration may be paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A restricted stock unit award will entitle the holder to receive one share of our common stock for each awarded unit upon the completion of a designated service period and/or the attainment of specified performance objectives as determined by the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares of common stock underlying the restricted stock units may be issued immediately upon vesting or may be deferred to a later date, as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A performance share award will be denominated in shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of the award, the Plan Administrator will determine the performance goal or goals to be attained in order for the underlying shares to vest, any additional period of service required of the grantee after the performance goals are attained, the amount of consideration to be paid, if any, for the performance shares and the form in which such consideration may be paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance shares which vest under the terms of the award may be settled in shares of our common stock or in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Settlement may occur at the time of vesting or may be deferred to a later date, as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A performance unit award will be denominated in terms of a fixed dollar amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of the award, the Plan Administrator will determine the performance goal or goals to be attained in order for the performance units to vest and any additional period of service required of the grantee after those performance goals are attained.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance units which vest under the terms of the award will be paid in cash or, at the discretion of the Plan Administrator, may be settled in shares of our common stock with a fair market value equal to such cash amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Settlement may occur at the time of vesting or may be deferred to a later date, as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Phantom Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Phantom shares are denominated in terms of our common stock, but do not provide any actual stockholder rights to the individual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of the award, the Plan Administrator will determine the performance criteria to be attained and/or the service period, if any, to be completed in order for the phantom shares to vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any phantom shares which vest under the terms of the award may be settled in shares of our common stock or in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Settlement may occur at the time of vesting or may be deferred to a later date, as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend Equivalent Rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator may provide that any awards other than options or SARs earn dividends or dividend equivalent rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such dividends or dividend equivalent rights will be credited to a participants account either at the time of dividend payment or at the time of settlement of the award, provided that as to any dividend equivalent rights granted in connection with an award that is subject to vesting requirements, no payment shall be made with respect to such dividend equivalent rights (or, in the case of a restricted stock or similar award where the dividend must be paid as a matter of law, the dividend payment shall be subject to forfeiture or repayment, as the case may be) unless and to the extent that the related vesting conditions of such award are satisfied.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Criteria
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To enable compensation attributable to one or more awards under the 2017 Restatement to qualify as performance-based compensation that is not intended to be subject to the $1,000,000 limitation imposed by Section 162(m) on the income tax deductibility of the compensation paid per covered executive officer, our Compensation Committee will have the discretionary authority to structure one or more awards so that the shares of common stock subject to those particular awards will not vest unless certain pre-established performance goals are achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such goals may be based on one or more of the following criteria:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) revenue target or revenue growth;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) achievement of specified milestones in the discovery, development or regulatory approval of one or more of our products;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) achievement of specified milestones in the commercialization of one or more of our products;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) achievement of specified milestones in the manufacturing of one or more of our products;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) cost reduction or other expense control targets;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) personal management objectives;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) stock price (including, but not limited to, growth measures);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (viii) total stockholder return;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ix) earnings per share;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (x) operating efficiency;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xi) operating margin;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xii) gross margin;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xiii) return measures (including, but not limited to, return on assets, capital, equity, or sales);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xiv) net sales growth;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xv) productivity ratios;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xvi) operating income;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xvii) net operating profit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xviii) net earnings or net income (before or after taxes);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xix) cash flow (including, but not limited to, operating cash flow, free cash flow, and cash flow return on capital);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xx) earnings or operating income before interest, taxes, depreciation, amortization and/or stock-based compensation expense; (xxi) economic value added; (xxii) market share; (xxiii) customer satisfaction; (xxiv) working capital targets; (xxv) budget objectives; (xxvi) mergers, acquisitions or divestitures; and (xxvii) with respect to awards not intended to be performance-based compensation under Section 162(m), other measures of performance selected by the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each performance objective may be based upon the attainment of specified levels of our performance measured under one or more of the criteria described above, either in absolute terms or in relation to the performance of other entities, and may also be based on the performance of any of our business units or divisions or any parent or subsidiary company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, one or more of such performance criteria may be measured in terms of percentage achievement of the budgeted amounts established for those criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each applicable performance objective may include a minimum threshold level of performance below which no award will be earned, levels of performance at which specified portions of the award will be earned and a maximum level of performance at which the award will be fully earned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each applicable performance criteria may be structured at the time of the award to provide for appropriate adjustment for one or more of the following items or any similar item or event:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) asset impairments or write-downs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) litigation and governmental investigation expenses and judgments, verdicts or claim settlements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the effect of changes in tax law, accounting principles or other laws, regulations or provisions affecting reported results;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the effect of exchange rates for non-U.S. dollar denominated net sales or goals based on operating profit, earnings or income;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) accruals for reorganization and restructuring programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) any unusual in nature or infrequently occurring items, as determined under generally accepted accounting principles or as described in managements discussion and analysis of financial condition and results of operations appearing in our annual report to stockholders for the applicable year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) costs and expenses incurred in connection with mergers and acquisitions;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (viii) items of income, gain, loss or expense attributable to the operations of any business acquired by us or any parent or subsidiary or of any joint venture established by us or any parent or subsidiary;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ix) items of income, gain, loss or expense attributable to one or more business operations divested by us or any parent or subsidiary or the gain or loss realized upon the sale of any such divested business or the assets thereof; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (x) the effect of any change in the outstanding shares of our common stock effected by reason of a stock split, stock dividend, stock repurchase, reorganization, recapitalization, merger, consolidation, spin-off, combination or exchange of shares or other similar corporate change or any distributions to our stockholders other than regular cash dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New Plan Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described above, the selection of participants who will receive awards under the 2017 Restatement and the size and types of wards will be determined by the Plan Administrator in its discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the amount of any future awards under the 2017 Restatement is not yet determinable and it is not possible to predict the benefits or amounts that will be received by, or allocated to, particular individuals or groups of employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see the 2016 Grants of Plan-Based Awards Table on page 79 for information on wards granted in 2016 under the 2004 Plan to certain of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On February 28, 2017, the fair market value was $70.48 per share, based on the closing sale price of our common stock on that date on the NASDAQ Global Select Market.

sentences.text: General Provisions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limitations on Vesting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except with respect to a maximum of 5% of the total number of shares of common stock authorized for issuance under the 2017 Restatement, no awards of restricted stock or restricted stock units which vest solely on the basis of continued service with us or any parent or subsidiary company will provide for vesting at a rate more rapid than annual pro rata vesting over a three-year period, and any awards of restricted stock, restricted stock units, performance shares or performance units which provide for vesting upon the attainment of performance goals will provide for a performance period of at least 12 months; provided, however, that such limitations will not apply in the event of a change in control transaction or to any award recipient whose service terminates by reason of death, disability, a constructive termination, or an involuntary termination other than for cause or to any award made after June 30, 2013 to a non-employee Board member.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transferability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, awards under the 2017 Restatement may not, prior to settlement, be transferred assigned, pledged or disposed of in any manner other than by will or the laws of inheritance following the grantees death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, a grantee may assign awards to a revocable living trust established by the grantee (or by the grantee and his or her spouse) of which he or she is a trustee or co-trustee with his or her spouse.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, a grantee may designate a beneficiary to receive the vested portion of his or her awards in the event of their death, and the Plan Administrator also has the authority to allow the transfer of awards other than incentive stock options by gift or pursuant to a domestic relations order to members of the grantees immediate family or former spouse.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination of Employment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon termination of employment, the grantee will have a limited period in which to exercise outstanding stock options or stock appreciation rights as to any shares which are vested at that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The applicable post-employment exercise period will be determined by the Plan Administrator, need not be uniform for all awards made under the 2017 Restatement, and may reflect distinctions based on the reasons for termination of employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other outstanding awards held by a grantee at the time of his or her termination of employment (other than by reason of death, total and permanent disability or for some awards, retirement) will be forfeited to the extent they are not vested at that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the grantee previously paid any cash consideration for the forfeited shares, then the company will pay to such individual the lower of the cash amount paid for those shares or their then fair market value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferral of Settlement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator may provide selected grantees with the opportunity to defer receipt of the shares of common stock or other consideration due upon the settlement of their awards following the satisfaction of the applicable vesting requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator will have the discretionary authority, subject to the applicable requirements of Section 409A of the Code, to establish the election process, the amounts eligible for deferral, the procedures for crediting interest or other investment return on the deferred amounts, the timing and form of payment of those deferred amounts and such other terms, conditions, rules and procedures as the Plan Administrator deems advisable for the administration of the deferral program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock options and stock appreciation rights outstanding under the 2017 Restatement at the time a change in control is effected will be subject to one or more of the following methods of disposition:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the options and stock appreciation rights may be assumed by the surviving corporation or replaced with economically equivalent cash or equity awards,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the options and stock appreciation rights may vest in full immediately prior to the change in control and then terminate immediately after the consummation of the change in control, to the extent not previously exercised, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the options and stock appreciation rights may be continued in full force and effect following such change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any other awards outstanding under the 2017 Restatement at the time a change in control is effected will automatically vest in full on an accelerated basis, and the shares of common stock subject to those awards will be issued as fully vested shares, immediately prior to the change in control, except to the extent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) those awards are assumed by the successor corporation or otherwise continued in effect or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) such awards are replaced with economically equivalent cash or equity awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards under the 2017 Restatement will vest in full in the event the grantees service with us or the successor entity is terminated (actually or constructively) within a designated period following a change in control in which those awards are assumed, replaced with an economically-equivalent substitute award or otherwise continued in effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Plan Administrator will have the discretion to structure one or more awards under the 2017 Restatement so that the shares subject to those awards will vest immediately prior to the effective date of a change in control, whether or not those awards are assumed, replaced with an economically-equivalent substitute award or otherwise continued in effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards subject to performance-vesting requirements may be structured so that upon the occurrence of a change in control prior to the completion of the applicable performance measurement period, the performance goal or goals established for those awards will be deemed to have been met at a level pre-specified in the award agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A change in control will be deemed to occur in the event
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) we are acquired by merger or asset sale,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) any person or group of related persons becomes directly or indirectly the beneficial owner of securities possessing more than 50% of the total combined voting power of our outstanding securities,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) certain changes occur in the composition of our Board, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) we are dissolved or liquidated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibition against Repricing
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without the consent of our stockholders, no award granted under the 2017 Restatement may be repriced, replaced, regranted through cancellation or modified (other than in the event of certain changes in our capital structure as described below), if the effect would be to reduce the exercise or purchase price in effect for the shares underlying that award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the Plan Administrator may not implement any of the following repricing programs under the 2017 Restatement without obtaining stockholder approval:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the cancellation of outstanding options or stock appreciation rights in return for new options or stock appreciation rights with a lower exercise price per share,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the cancellation of outstanding options or stock appreciation rights with exercise prices per share in excess of the then current fair market value per share of our common stock for consideration payable in cash, property, or other award, except in connection with a change in control transaction, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the direct reduction of the exercise price in effect for outstanding options or stock appreciation rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjustments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event any change is made to our outstanding common stock as a result of any stock split, stock dividend, recapitalization, combination of shares, exchange of shares, spin-off transaction or other change affecting our outstanding common stock as a class, or should the value of the outstanding shares of our common stock change as a result of a spin-off transaction or an extraordinary dividend or distribution, or should there occur any merger, consolidation or other reorganization, then equitable and proportional adjustments will be made to the maximum number and class(es) of securities issuable under the 2017 Restatement, the maximum number and class(es) of securities issuable under the 2017 Restatement pursuant to incentive stock options granted under such plan after December 31, 2012, and the maximum number and class(es) of securities for which the various types of awards under the 2017 Restatement may be made to any person during any calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outstanding awards under the 2017 Restatement will also be equitably and proportionally adjusted as to the number and class(es) of securities and exercise price (or other cash consideration) payable per share under each such award; provided, however, that the aggregate exercise price (or other cash consideration) will remain the same.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The adjustments will be made in such a manner as the Plan Administrator deems appropriate and such adjustments will be final, binding and conclusive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Withholding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator may provide holders of awards under the 2017 Restatement with the right to use shares of our common stock in satisfaction of all or part of the federal and state income and employment withholding taxes to which they may become subject in connection with the exercise, vesting or settlement of those awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Either of the following alternatives may be utilized to satisfy the applicable withholding taxes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock withholding: The election to have us withhold, from the shares otherwise issuable upon the exercise, vesting or settlement of that award, a portion of those shares with an aggregate fair market value equal to the percentage of the withholding taxes as determined by the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock delivery: The election to deliver to us, at the time of the exercise, vesting or settlement of such award, shares of our common stock at the time held by such individual with an aggregate fair market value equal to the percentage of the withholding taxes as determined by the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Plan Administrator may structure an award under the 2017 Restatement so that a portion of the shares of common stock otherwise issuable under those awards will automatically be withheld by us in satisfaction of the withholding taxes which become applicable in connection with the exercise, vesting or settlement of that award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amendments and Termination
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board may amend, suspend or terminate the 2017 Restatement at any time; provided, however, no amendments to the 2017 Restatement will be made without the approval of our stockholders, if such approval is required by applicable law or regulation or the listing standards of the exchange on which our common stock is at the time primarily traded, or if such amendment would change any provisions of Section 4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b)(vi) or Section 13
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) of the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless earlier terminated by our Board, the 2017 Restatement will terminate on May  10, 2027.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Federal Income Tax Consequences
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of the Federal income taxation treatment applicable to us and the participants who receive awards under the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Option Grants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Options granted under the 2017 Restatement may be either incentive stock options, which satisfy the requirements of Section 422 of the Code, or non-statutory stock options, which are not intended to meet such requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Federal income tax treatment for the two types of options differs as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incentive Stock Options
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No taxable income is recognized by the optionee at the time of the option grant, and no taxable income is recognized for ordinary income tax purposes at the time the option is exercised, although taxable income may arise at that time for alternative minimum tax purposes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The optionee will recognize taxable income in the year in which the purchased shares are sold or otherwise made the subject of certain other dispositions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Federal tax purposes, dispositions are divided into two categories:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) qualifying and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) disqualifying.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A qualifying disposition occurs if the sale or other disposition is made more than two years after the date the option for the shares involved in such sale or disposition is granted and more than one (1) year after the date the option is exercised for those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the sale or disposition occurs before those two periods are satisfied, then a disqualifying disposition will result.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a qualifying disposition, the optionee will recognize long-term capital gain in an amount equal to the excess of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the amount realized upon the sale or other disposition of the purchased shares over
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the exercise price paid for the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If there is a disqualifying disposition of the shares, then the excess of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the fair market value of those shares on the exercise date or (if less) the amount realized upon such sale or disposition over
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the exercise price paid for the shares will be taxable as ordinary income to the optionee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any additional gain or loss recognized upon the disposition will be a capital gain or loss.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the optionee makes a disqualifying disposition of the purchased shares, then we will be entitled to an income tax deduction, for the taxable year in which such disposition occurs, equal to the amount of ordinary income recognized by the optionee as a result of the disposition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will not be entitled to any income tax deduction if the optionee makes a qualifying disposition of the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Statutory Options
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No taxable income is recognized by an optionee upon the grant of a non-statutory option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The optionee in general will recognize ordinary income, in the year in which the option is exercised, equal to the excess of the fair market value of the purchased shares on the exercise date over the exercise price paid for the shares, and the optionee will be required to satisfy the tax withholding requirements applicable to such income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will be entitled to an income tax deduction equal to the amount of ordinary income recognized by the optionee with respect to the exercised non-statutory option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deduction in general will be allowed for our taxable year in which such ordinary income is recognized by the optionee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Appreciation Rights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No taxable income is recognized upon receipt of a stock appreciation right.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holder will recognize ordinary income in the year in which the stock appreciation right is exercised, in an amount equal to the excess of the fair market value of the underlying shares of common stock on the exercise date over the base price in effect for the exercised right, and the holder will be required to satisfy the tax withholding requirements applicable to such income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will be entitled to an income tax deduction equal to the amount of ordinary income recognized by the holder in connection with the exercise of the stock appreciation right.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deduction will be allowed for the taxable year in which such ordinary income is recognized.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recipient of unvested shares of common stock issued under the 2017 Restatement will not recognize any taxable income at the time those shares are issued but will have to report as ordinary income, as and when those shares subsequently vest, an amount equal to the excess of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the fair market value of the shares on the vesting date over
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the cash consideration (if any) paid for the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recipient may, however, elect under Section 83(b) of the Code to include as ordinary income in the year the unvested shares are issued an amount equal to the excess of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the fair market value of those shares on the issue date over
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the cash consideration (if any) paid for such shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Section 83(b) election is made, the recipient will not recognize any additional income as and when the shares subsequently vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the deductibility limitations of Section 162(m) described below, we will be entitled to an income tax deduction equal to the amount of ordinary income recognized by the recipient with respect to the unvested shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deduction in general will be allowed for our taxable year in which such ordinary income is recognized by the recipient.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No taxable income is recognized upon receipt of restricted stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holder will recognize ordinary income in the year in which the shares subject to the units are actually issued to the holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of that income will be equal to the fair market value of the shares on the date of issuance, and the holder will be required to satisfy the tax withholding requirements applicable to such income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the deductibility limitations of Section 162(m) described below, we will be entitled to an income tax deduction equal to the amount of ordinary income recognized by the holder at the time the shares are issued.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deduction will be allowed for the taxable year in which such ordinary income is recognized.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Shares/Performance Units/Phantom Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No taxable income is recognized upon receipt of such award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holder will recognize ordinary income in the year in which the shares subject to the award are actually issued or in the year in which the award is settled in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of that income will be equal to the fair market value of the shares on the date of issuance or the amount of the cash paid in settlement of the award, and the holder will be required to satisfy the tax withholding requirements applicable to the income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will be entitled to an income tax deduction equal to the amount of ordinary income recognized by the holder at the time the shares are issued or the cash amount is paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deduction will be allowed for the taxable year in which such ordinary income is recognized.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deductibility of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We anticipate that any compensation deemed paid by us in connection with the exercise of non-statutory stock options or stock appreciation rights or the disqualifying disposition of incentive stock option shares will qualify as performance-based compensation for purposes of Section 162(m) and will not have to be taken into account for purposes of the $1,000,000 limitation per covered individual on the deductibility of the compensation paid to certain of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the compensation deemed paid with respect to options and stock appreciation rights granted under the 2017 Restatement will remain deductible by us without limitation under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, any compensation deemed paid by us in connection with any other awards made under 2017 Restatement will be subject to the $1,000,000 limitation, unless the vesting of those awards is tied to performance goals based on one or more of the performance criteria described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has full discretion to determine whether or not awards made under the Plan will be structured so as to qualify as performance-based compensation under Section 162(m) and will make its decision based on all the relevant factors, including potential tax deductibility, in existence at the time of the award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Required Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting will be required to approve the 2017 Restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will be counted toward the tabulation of votes cast and will have the same effect as negative votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes are counted toward a quorum, but are not counted for any purpose in determining whether this proposal has been approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR PROPOSAL 3.
