sentences.text: PROPOSAL 4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE TO APPROVE THE COMPENSATION OF OUR NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon a vote of stockholders at the 2011 annual meeting of stockholders, following our Boards recommendation for an annual advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Named Executive Officers, we are providing stockholders with an advisory vote to approve the compensation of our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the vote is non-binding, our Board and Compensation Committee value the opinions of our stockholders and will consider the outcome of the vote when making future compensation decisions affecting our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we continued to focus efforts to identify, develop and deliver best-in-class drugs that advance the current standard of care and address unmet medical needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our total revenues grew 262% over the last five years and our stock price performance during the same period far exceeded the Nasdaq Biotech Index and S&P 500 Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved this growth while enhancing our operating margins and maintaining an operationally efficient organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to the dynamics of the HCV product market, which is characterized by a rapid uptake after launch as a warehoused group of patients seek treatment followed by a deceleration of demand as that group of patients complete their treatment, our total revenues increased dramatically from 2013 to 2015 and then declined in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite the decline in our HCV revenues, revenues for our HIV and other antiviral products were up 17% over 2015 and 24% over the past three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our HIV and other antiviral product revenues represented 43% of our total product sales, up from 34% in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sales in each of our other therapeutic areas also increased.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also achieved a number of operational achievements, including the successful launch of four new products in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For specific 2016 corporate achievements, please see the business highlights under Compensation Discussion and Analysis beginning on page 55.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A substantial portion of compensation for each Named Executive Officer (NEO) is tied directly to Gileads performance, with 90% of our Chief Executive Officers direct compensation and 83% of direct compensation for our other NEOs based on corporate performance and paid in the form of long-term equity awards and annual cash bonuses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term equity incentive awards have historically been the largest component of our total direct compensation opportunities for our executive officers and comprise 73% of our Chief Executive Officers direct compensation and 64% of direct compensation of our other NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this mix is appropriate because the NEOs should focus their efforts on achieving short- and long-term corporate results, which will ultimately drive stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our pay mix and pay programs are designed to ensure that our NEOs are aligned with the interests of our stockholders as our NEOs only realize value from their equity awards, the largest component of their total direct compensation opportunities, if our financial and total shareholder return (TSR) performance is strong.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance-based approach to compensation is functioning as intended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of our fiscal 2016 financial and TSR performance, the performance-based equity pay was earned significantly below the target amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receptive to Stockholder Feedback
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we contacted a number of our stockholders and the two largest proxy advisors to gain valuable insights into the issue about which they care most.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to continuing the dialogue on key corporate
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: governance topics such as board refreshment and environmental, social and governance reporting, we asked our stockholders whether they had any concerns about our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholders we contacted did not express concerns about our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2016 annual meeting of stockholders, approximately 96% of the votes cast were in favor of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee carefully reviews feedback from our engagement activities and the voting results when making decisions regarding our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee did not change our executive compensation program based on the 2016 stockholder advisory vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee closely evaluates our company performance and compensation programs and will continue to take action to ensure that our compensation programs are aligned with our long-term performance and stockholder interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may express their views directly to our Compensation Committee as described in our Stockholders Communications with the Board policy available on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Resolution
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders are being asked to approve by advisory vote the following resolution relating to the compensation of the Named Executive Officers in this Proxy Statement:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that Gileads stockholders hereby approve the compensation paid to Gileads executive officers named in the Summary Compensation Table of this Proxy Statement, as that compensation is disclosed pursuant to Item 402 of Regulation S-K, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the various compensation tables and the accompanying narrative discussion included in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote on this resolution is not intended to address any specific element of compensation; rather the vote relates to the compensation of the Named Executive Officers, as described in this Proxy Statement in accordance with the compensation disclosure rules of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR PROPOSAL 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE AS TO THE FREQUENCY OF FUTURE DVISORY SHAREHOLDER VOTES ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Act enables our stockholders to indicate how frequently we should seek an advisory vote on the compensation of our amed executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By voting on this proposal, stockholders may indicate whether they prefer an advisory vote on named executive fficer compensation every one, two or three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders also will have the option to abstain from voting on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After careful consideration of this proposal, our Board has determined that an advisory vote on executive compensation that occurs every year is the most appropriate alternative for Gilead, and therefore our Board recommends that you vote for a one-year interval for the advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes an annual advisory vote on executive compensation will allow our stockholders to provide us with their direct input on our compensation philosophy, policies and practices on a more consistent basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, an annual advisory vote on executive compensation is consistent with our policy of seeking input from, and engaging in discussions with, our stockholders on corporate governance matters and our executive compensation philosophy, policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We understand that our stockholders may have different views as to what is the best approach for Gilead, and we look forward to hearing from our stockholders on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholder vote under this proposal is not to approve the Boards recommendation but is instead an advisory vote on the particular frequency at which each stockholder would like future advisory votes on executive officer compensation to be conducted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may cast your vote on your preferred voting frequency by choosing the option of one year, two years, three years or you may abstain from voting on this Proposal 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholder vote on this proposal is advisory and not binding on our Board or Gilead.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, unless our Board should decide otherwise, the particular frequency that receives the highest number of votes cast by stockholders will be the frequency for future advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will be asked to vote on the frequency of an advisory vote on executive compensation at least once every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR 1 YEAR FOR PROPOSAL 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 6
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL REQUESTING THAT THE BOARD TAKE STEPS TO PERMIT STOCKHOLDER ACTION BY WRITTEN CONSENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James McRitchie has submitted a stockholder proposal for consideration at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. McRitchies address is 9295 Yorkship Court, Elk Grove, CA 95758.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have been notified that Mr. McRitchie has continuously held 200 shares of our common stock since at least November 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If properly presented at the Annual Meeting, the Board unanimously recommends a vote AGAINST the following proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The resolution being submitted by Mr. McRitchie to the stockholders for approval is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Proposal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 6  Right to Act by Written Consent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Resolved, Shareholders request that our board of directors undertake such steps as may be necessary to permit written consent by shareholders entitled to cast the minimum number of votes that would be necessary to authorize the action at a meeting at which all shareholders entitled to vote thereon were present and voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This written consent is to be consistent with applicable law and consistent with giving shareholders the fullest power to act by written consent consistent with applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This includes shareholder ability to initiate any topic for written consent consistent with applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder right to act by written consent and to call a special meeting are two complimentary ways to bring an important matter to the attention of both management and shareholders outside the annual meeting cycle.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both are associated with increased governance quality and shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder right to act by written consent is one method to equalize our limited provisions for shareholders to call a special meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For instance, it takes 20% of Gilead Sciences shares outstanding to call a special meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delaware law would allow those with 10% of shares outstanding to call a special meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With a net requirement of 20%, a significant percentage of Gilead Sciences shareholders could be disenfranchised from having any voice whatsoever in calling a special meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That makes enactment of right to written consent all the more important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal topic won 47% support last year at Gilead Sciences, up from 46% a year earlier.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also won majority shareholder support at 13 major companies in a single year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This included 67%-support at both Allstate and Sprint.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hundreds of major companies enable shareholders to act by written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote FOR our Right to Act by Written Consent to protect shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Recommends a Vote AGAINST This Proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards View Aligns with Recent Stockholder Votes on this Issue
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board carefully considered the advisory votes regarding written consent at our 2012-2016 annual meetings of stockholders and concluded that our stockholders are better served by holding meetings where all stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: are provided with notice of the meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: may discuss the proposed actions; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote their shares at a designated time using the familiar stockholder vote processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This view is in accord with our stockholders who cast the majority of votes AGAINST this proposal at the last four annual meetings of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder meetings provide stockholders with a more effective
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: means to participate in proposed actions and facilitate more rigorous and careful consideration of proposed actions by both the Board and the stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board continues to believe that the right to call a special meeting is superior to this proposal in terms of giving our stockholders a meaningful voice within our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Written Consent May Disenfranchise Smaller Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unlike meetings of stockholders, action by written consent would:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: result in certain stockholders being denied the ability to be informed about, vote on or otherwise have a say on proposed stockholder actions;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: enable a bare majority of stockholders to take action on a proposal without the benefit of hearing the views, questions and arguments of other stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: potentially result in multiple contradictory consents being solicited simultaneously, creating administrative and financial burde for the company and also putting our stockholders at risk of confusion;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: disenfranchise smaller stockholders, in particular in a consent solicitation that does not require their involvement to achieve majority support; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: enable a party attempting an unsolicited bid to circumvent negotiating with the Board and result in terms that are not in the best interest of all stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, action by written consent eliminates the need for notice to be given to stockholders about a proposed action, and therefore, certain stockholders may not be informed about the proposed action until after the action has already been taken.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This would deny these stockholders the ability to determine whether to exercise their rights, such as by expressing their views as to the merits of the proposal, encouraging the Board to reconsider the matter and voting on the proposed action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board, therefore, believes that this proposal could adversely affect the conduct of stockholder business by resulting in certain stockholders taking action that otherwise would not have been taken if all of our stockholders were informed about and afforded the opportunity to discuss, debate and vote on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board has Demonstrated Responsiveness to Stockholders and Adopted Governance Structures that Create Accountability to Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adoption of this proposal is unnecessary because our Board has already taken a number of significant steps to ensure accountability to tockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Established a strong engagement program to develop relationships and maintain ongoing dialogue with our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, in 2016, we held discussions with a number of our large stockholders and the two largest proxy advisory firms to solicit their feedback on our corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our conversations with investors are consistent with the voting results on this issuewhile some view written consent a an important right, the majority of our stockholders do not support adopting it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We adopted proxy access, which permits a stockholder, or a group of up to 20 stockholders, owning 3% or more of Gileads outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years, to nominate and include in Gileads proxy materials director nominees constituting up to 20% of the Board (or at least two directors).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2012 annual meeting, our stockholders voted to request that our Board take steps to redeem Gileads rights plan or poison pill unless the plan was subject to a stockholder vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In response, our Board adopted an amendment that terminated Gileads rights plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We permit stockholders or group of stockholders holding 20% or more of our outstanding shares of common stock to call a special meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is no limitation on the timing or agenda of a special meeting called by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders may propose any proper matter for a vote at our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board structure designates a lead independent director to ensure a strong, independent and active Board of Directors and establish a lead independent contact should stockholders want to speak with a member of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have eliminated all supermajority voting provisions in our certificate of incorporation and bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our director nominees are elected annually by majority voting in uncontested elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A substantial majority of our directors (seven out of the nine director nominees) are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We only have one class of stock with equal voting provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes that adoption of this proposal would significantly disenfranchise a large proportion of our stockholders and is no ecessary given other accountability mechanisms that our Board has adopted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board therefore recommends a vote AGAINST this roposal as it is not in the best interests of Gilead or our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS A VOTE AGAINST PROPOSAL 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL REQUESTING THAT THE BOARD ADOPT A POLICY THAT THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BE AN INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John Chevedden has submitted a stockholder proposal for consideration at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cheveddens address is 2215 Nelson Avenue, No. 205, Redondo Beach, CA 90278.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have been notified that Mr. Chevedden has continuously held 100 shares of our common stock since July 1, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If properly presented at the Annual Meeting, the Board unanimously recommends a vote AGAINST the following proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The resolution being submitted by Mr. Chevedden to the stockholders for approval is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Proposal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 7  Independent Board Chairman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders request our Board of Directors to adopt as policy, and amend our governing documents as necessary, to require the Chair of the Board of Directors, whenever possible, to be an independent member of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board would have the discretion to phase in this policy for the next CEO transition, implemented so it does not violate any existing agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Board determines that a Chair who was independent when selected is no longer independent, the Board shall select a new Chair who satisfies the requirements of the policy within a reasonable amount of time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compliance with this policy is waived if no independent director is available and willing to serve as Chair.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal requests that all the necessary steps be taken to accomplish the above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Caterpillar reversed itself by naming an independent board chairman in October 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Caterpillar had opposed a shareholder proposal for an independent board chairman as recent as its June 2016 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wells Fargo also reversed itself and named an independent board chairman in October 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to Institutional Shareholder Services 53% of the Standard & Poors 1,500 firms separate these 2 positions2015 Board Practices, April 12, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal topic won 50%-plus support at 5 major U.S. companies in 2013 including 73%-support at Netflix
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the responsibility of the Board of Directors to protect shareholders long-term interests by providing independent oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By setting agendas, priorities and procedures, the Chairman is critical in shaping the work of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having a board chairman who is independent of management is a practice that will promote greater management accountability to shareholders and lead to a more objective evaluation of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal is of particular importance to our company since our stock price fell about 30% in the year leading up to the submittal of this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also do not have the right to act by written consenta sign that management does not value shareholder input.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to the Millstein Center for Corporate Governance and Performance (Yale School of Management), The independent chair curbs conflicts of interest, promotes oversight of risk, manages the relationship between the board and CEO, serves as a conduit for regular communication with shareowners, and is a logical next step in the development of an independent board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A number of institutional investors said that a strong, objective board leader can best provide the necessary oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, the California Public Employees Retirement Systems Global Principles of Accountable Corporate Governance recommends that a companys board should be chaired by an independent director, as does the Council of Institutional Investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An independent director serving as chairman can help ensure the functioning of an effective board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote to enhance shareholder value: Independent Board ChairmanProposal 7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Recommends a Vote AGAINST This Proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards View Aligns with Recent Stockholder Votes on this Issue
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2013, 2014 and 2015, our Board carefully considered stockholder proposals requesting that our Board adopt a policy that the Chairman of the Board be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board continues to believe that stockholder interests are best served when the Board has the flexibility to determine the best person to serve as Chairman, whether that person is an independent director, a director employed by Gilead or another person, and recommends a vote AGAINST this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This view is in accord with our stockholders who cast the majority of votes against this proposal at our 2013, 2014 and 2015 annual meetings of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Should Have Flexibility to Structure an Appropriate Governance Structure Tailored to the needs of Gilead
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gileads Board Guidelines provides our Board flexibility to designate Gileads Chairman and board leadership structure as our Board deems appropriate based on the circumstances at the time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our policy enables our Board to choose a leadership structure that can be tailored to the strengths of Gileads officers and directors and best addresses Gileads evolving and highly complex business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Departing from Gileads current policy would unduly impair our Boards ability to select the director it believes is best suited to serve as Chairman based on the circumstances at the time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes that it is currently in the best interests of Gilead and its stockholders for Dr. Martin to serve as our Executive Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Martins previous experience as our Chief Executive Officer as well as his experience serving as Chairman of the Board since May 2008 enables him to uniquely provide insight into our business and support Dr. Milligan as Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Executive Chairman, Dr. Martins primary responsibilities include coordinating the activity of the Board with our lead independent director and working with external stakeholders, including academic thought leaders and government agencies, and individuals across the organization on opportunities for continued innovation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given their proven leadership capabilities, breadth of industry experience and business success, our Board concluded that Gilead is best served with this leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, our Board believes Gilead can more effectively execute its strategy and business plans to maximize stockholder value if Dr. Martin holds the Executive Chairman position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes the robust role of the lead independent director and Gileads other strong corporate governance policies and practices provide effective oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, our Boards approach to this issue is consistent with that of most large, publicly-traded companies in the United States29% of companies in the S&P 500 have an independent chairman, but only 4% require a separate chairman, according to the Spencer Stuart 2015 Board Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our Board determined that an independent chairman would better meet the needs of Gilead, our Board has the authority to do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Lead Independent Director and Our Strong Governance Structures Ensure our Boards Independent Leadership and Accountability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the robust duties of our lead independent director empower our independent directors to provide effective guidance, challenge and oversight of management:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board Guidelines provide that where the Chairman is an employee of the company, the independent directors will appoint a lead independent director to coordinate their
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: efforts and activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The defined role of lead independent director at Gilead is closely aligned with the role of an independent Chairman, ensuring a strong, independent and active Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Lead Independent Charter adopted by our Board, the lead independent director has clearly delineated and comprehensive duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presiding at all meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serving as principal liaison between the independent directors and the Chairman and between the independent directors and senior management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving information sent to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving agendas for the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving meeting schedules to ensure that there is sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: calling meetings of the independent directors when necessary and appropriate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: responding directly to stockholder and other stakeholder questions and comments that are directed to the lead independent director or to the independent directors as a group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recommending to the Board and the Board committees the retention of advisers and consultants to report directly to the Board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: communicating to management, as appropriate, the results of private discussions among independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as required by our Board Guidelines, Gileads independent directors meet without executive management on a routine asis to review, among other things, Gileads strategy, performance, management effectiveness and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Dr ogan conducts an annual assessment of the Board and committees of the Board to evaluate their effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Substantial majority of our directors are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, seven out of the nine director nominees are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fully-independent Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the key Board committeesthe Audit Committee, the Compensation Committee and the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committeeare independent in accordance with or as defined in the rules adopted by the SEC and NASDAQ and Gileads own Board Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This ensures that oversight of critical matters such as the integrity of our financial statements, the compensation of our executive officers, the selection and evaluation of directors and the development of corporate governance principles is entrusted to independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ongoing Board refreshment: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee regularly evaluates the Boards composition to ensure a diversity of perspectives and a combined skill-set to oversee managements execution of our strate
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Established corporate governance guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain strong corporate governance policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information regarding our corporate governance initiatives, including our Board Guidelines and the charter for each Board committee, can be found on our website at http://www.gilead.com in the Investors section under Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our strong corporate governance policies and practices, including the substantial percentage of independent directors on our Board, as well as the robust duties of our lead independent director, empower our independent directors to effectively oversee our managementincluding the performance of our Executive Chairman and Chief Executive Officerand provide an effective and appropriately balanced board governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the interests of our stockholders will be best served by maintaining our Boards flexibility in determining the board leadership structure that is best suited to the needs of Gilead at any particular time.

sentences.text: Our Board therefore recommends a vote AGAINST this proposal as it is not in the best interests of Gilead or its stockholders.

sentences.text: COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS

sentences.text: This Compensation Discussion and Analysis provides an overview of the components of our executive compensation program and the 2016 executive compensation decisions of the Compensation Committee of our Board of Directors (our Compensation Committee) for our Named Executive Officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John F. Milligan, our President and Chief Executive Officer (our Chief Executive Officer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Milligan assumed the role of President and Chief Executive Officer effective March 10, 2016, after serving as President and Chief Operating Officer since 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John C. Martin, our Executive Chairman (our Former Chief Executive Officer).

sentences.text: Company Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are a research-based biopharmaceutical company that discovers, develops and commercializes innovative medicines in areas of unmet medical need.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have 21 marketed products and our primary areas of focus include HIV, liver diseases, such as chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection and chronic hepatitis B virus (HBV) infection, hematology/oncology, cardiovascular and inflammation/respiratory diseases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our total revenues grew 262% over the last five years and our stock price performance during the same period far exceeded the Nasdaq Biotech Index and S&P 500 Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved this growth while enhancing our operating margins and maintaining an operationally efficient organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our curative HCV products created a new revenue dynamic for us which was reflected in our significant revenues growth from 2013  2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Stock performance reflects the cumulative return on investment assuming an investment of $100 in our common stock, the NBI Index and the S&P 500 Index on December 30, 2011, and that all dividends were reinvested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We significantly diversified our portfolio of products over the past several years by launching our curative HCV products, creating a new revenue dynamic.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our HCV products created a new revenue dynamic for us as they offer cure rates as high as 95-99 percent for all genotypes (1-6 of HCV infection in less time (as little as eight weeks) and with fewer side effects than prior treatments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These products are characterized by a rapid uptake after launch as a warehoused group of patients seek treatment followed by a deceleration of demand as that group of patients complete their treatment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This effect caused our HCV and total revenues to increase dramatically from 2013 to 2015 and then to decline in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we anticipate HCV revenues in 2017 will decline from the prior year levels due to a decline in patient starts, there are st many patients to treat and we expect our HCV business to generate significant revenues and cash flows in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite the short term revenue volatility created by the dynamics of the HCV cure market, the significant revenue growth generated by these products provides us with critical resources to invest in our internal pipeline and external opportunities in order to create long-term stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business model continues to be characterized by significant capital investment, long lead times for discovery and development and unpredictable outcomes due to the nature of developing medication for human use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Investments in our product pipeline take time to mature, as our business faces multi-year development cycles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We establish goals and metrics and measure performance not only based on the achievement of financial goals, but also by evaluating performance across a range of operational goals that support our long-term strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that both our financial and operational achievements are critical to our future success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to building and sustaining long-term growth by expanding our product pipeline and therapeutic areas through internal discovery and innovation as well as product acquisition and in-licensing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This illustration of the drug development industry life cycle highlights the importance of sustained investment and performance, which ultimately drives commercial and financial results:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highlights of 2016 Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating Performance:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, our revenues declined 7% compared to 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This was our first year of declining revenues since 2003 and was attributable to he dynamics of the HCV market described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite the decline in our HCV revenues, revenues for our HIV and other antiviral products were up 17% over 2015 and 24% over the past three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our HIV and other antiviral product revenues represented 43% of our otal product sales, up from 34% in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our growth in the HIV area resulted from our continued innovation over the years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sales in each of our other therapeutic areas also increased.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By the end of 2016, we had treated approximately 1.3 million HCV-infected individuals around the world with our breakthrough HCV drugs in just three years while eliminating the debilitating side effects of earlier drugs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, more than 10 million HIV patients in resource-limited countries are receiving a Gilead-based HIV regimen, representing two-thirds of the countries in the world and the regions hardest hit by HIV/AIDS.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our decline in revenues due to the dynamics of the HCV market impacted our total shareholder return (TSR), which was down on a one-year basis, as illustrated below : (1)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Data per S&P Research Insight as of December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pipeline and Innovation Performance:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed above, our continued success will be driven by advancing our drug development pipeline and achieving other operational goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key achievements in 2016 included the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Successful launch of four new products in 2016  (1) Odefsey  for the treatment of HIV, (2) Descovy  for the treatment of HIV (3) Epclusa  for the treatment of HCV and (4) Vemlidy  for the treatment of HBV.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Significant pipeline progress across all therapeutic areas, including pending regulatory approval of the fixed-dose combination of sofosbuvir/velpatisivir/voxilaprevir for the treatment of HCV.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highlights include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positive results from a Phase 2 trial evaluating selonsertib in patients with nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) and moderate to severe liver fibrosis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advanced selonsertib to Phase 3 clinical trials;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advanced filgotinib, a JAK1 inhibitor, to Phase 3 trials for three inflammatory disease indications  rheumatoid arthritis, Crohns disease and ulcerative colitis;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positive data from a Phase 2 study demonstrating that bictegravir and emtricitabine/tenofovir alafenamide for the treatment of HIV demonstrated high virologic response rates; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positive data from Phase 3 studies evaluating the safety and efficacy of switching virologically suppressed HIV-1 infected patients from regimens containing Truvada  to regimens containing Descovy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highlights of our 2016 achievements are addressed in this Compensation Discussion and Analysis under Our 2016 Executive Compensation Decisions; Annual Bonuses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay for Performance Alignment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A substantial portion of compensation for each Named Executive Officer is tied directly to Gileads performance, with 90% of our Chief Executive Officers direct compensation and 83% of direct compensation for our other Named Executive Officers based on our corporate performance and paid in the form of long-term equity awards and annual cash bonuses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term equity incentive awards have historically been the largest component of our total direct compensation opportunities for our executive officers and comprise 73% of our Chief Executive Officers direct compensation and 64% of direct compensation of our other Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this mix is appropriate because the Named Executive Officers should focus their efforts on achieving short- and long-term corporate results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Earnings under our 2014 performance share awards, for which the multi-year performance period was completed at the end of fiscal 2016, are based on our three-year TSR performance and the cumulative revenue performance over the past three years.

sentences.text: Stockholder Engagement and 2016 Vote on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our relationship with our stockholders is a critical part of our success, and in 2016, we conducted extensive stockholder engagement to ensure that both management and the Board of Directors (our Board) understand and consider the issues that matter most to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We value the views of our stockholders, and we are committed to engaging in regular, transparent communication with stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The insights we have gained from these discussions over the years have been helpful to management and the Board in guiding our corporate policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we contacted a number of our stockholders and the two largest proxy advisors to gain valuable insights into the issues about which they care most.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to continuing the dialogue on key corporate governance topics such as board refreshment and environmental, social and governance reporting, we asked our stockholders whether they had any concerns about our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholders we contacted did not express concerns about our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2016 annual meeting of stockholders, approximately 96% of the votes cast were in favor of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee carefully reviews feedback from our engagement activities and the voting results when making decisions regarding our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee did not change our executive compensation program based on the 2016 stockholder advisory vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gileads Compensation Philosophy, Goals and Principles
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to the nature of our business, our executive compensation program is designed to reward progress in advancing our drug development pipeline and achieving other operational goals while aligning the short- and long-term interests of executives with those of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We deliver the majority of our Named Executive Officers compensation in the form of performance-based awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, a significant percentage of total target compensation is at-risk through both our short- and long-term incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These awards are directly linked to company performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A substantial portion of our executives total direct compensation is awarded in the form of equity awards, comprised of performance shares and stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is built on six fundamental principles:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance shares are tied to long-term relative TSR and annual revenue performance, measured over three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock options vest over four years and executives can realize value only to the extent the stock price appreciates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Market Competitiveness
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Balance the Short-and Long-Term Perspective
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While equity awards are tied to objective performance measures (revenue, TSR and absolute stock price appreciation), the annual bonus program is based on the evaluation of key short-term corporate financial and operational goals and individual performance goals that drive longer-term corporate performance and growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain best-in-class governance standards pertaining to the oversight of our executive compensation programs.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback policy allows for recoupment of any unearned compensation if financial results subsequently restated

sentences.text: No repricing of stock options without stockholder approval
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Chairman Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March 2016, we appointed a new Chief Executive Officer, John F. Milligan, who previously served as our President and Chief Operating Officer, and John C. Martin assumed the role of Executive Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board carefully evaluated the needs of Gilead when deciding to appoint Dr. Martin as Executive Chairman and thoughtfully defined the distinct roles of Executive Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Executive Officer is responsible for day-to-day management of the company and the overall execution of our strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Chairmans primary responsibilities include coordinating the activities of our Board with our lead independent director and working with external stakeholders, including academic thought leaders and government agencies, and individuals across the organization on opportunities for continued innovation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on Dr. Martins over 40 years of industry experience, including over 20 years as our Chief Executive Officer, his extensive knowledge of the industry, our anticipated opportunities and challenges as well as his proven leadership abilities in both building our company and bringing innovative medicines to market, our Board determined in 2017 that Dr. Martins continued role as Executive Chairman will allow us to further benefit from his continued involvement with the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Chairman role does not have a defined tenure; rather, our Board will assess the anticipated needs of our company each year in making the determination whether to extend the appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, when Dr. Martin initially assumed the role of Executive Chairman, his total compensation was decreased significantly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2017, his total compensation was further reduced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When considering the compensation for the Executive Chairman, the Board considered many factors, including the scope of Dr. Martins role and market practices.

sentences.text: 2016 Performance Share Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with prior years, performance share awards granted by our Compensation Committee in 2016 were divided into two equally weighted tranches: one subject to relative TSR performance conditions and one subject to three annual revenue-based performance goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee selected TSR and revenue as our performance measures because they relate to the key behaviors that it wants to reinforce.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These metrics also resonate strongly with our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Relative TSR Portion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance-based vesting requirement for the relative TSR shares is tied to the percentile level of our TSR for the three-year performance period from February 1, 2016 through December 31, 2018 relative to the TSR realized for that same period by the companies comprising the S&P Healthcare Sub-Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee selected the S&P Healthcare Sub-Index for comparison purposes because it enables our Compensation Committee to assess our financial performance against an objective peer group, which consists of approximately 35 companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TSR Percentile vs. Comparator Group    % of Target Paid 81  or above    200% of Target 50    100% of Target 20  or below    0% of Target st th th
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our absolute TSR is negative, the maximum vesting opportunity is capped at 100% of the target, regardless of our relativ performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To receive the earned shares, an executive officer must remain employed with us through the date on which our Compensation Committee certifies performance achievement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Absolute Revenue Portion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One-third of the shares subject to the revenue-based tranche of the 2016 performance shares are tied to achievement of our 2016 net product revenue goal, one-third are tied to a 2017 net product revenue goal and one-third are tied to a 2018 net product revenue goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each years net product revenue goal is established by our Compensation Committee in the first quarter of that year, and the payout level can range from 0% to 200% of each years target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The uncertainty of many external factors influencing our business, such as unanticipated pricing pressures from payers and competitors, potential amendments to the new healthcare legislation or other government action as well as volatility in the foreign currency exchange rates make it very difficult to forecast net product revenue beyond a one-year period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, our Compensation Committee has determined that an annual net product revenue goal, with a multi-year service period component, is the most appropriate metric.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of determining the achievement level, any product revenue realized during the fiscal year by any entity that we acquired during that year and the effect of any accounting change is excluded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revenue from an acquired entity is excluded to ensure that we hold ourselves accountable to the goals set at the beginning of the performance period and to ensure that our executives are not encouraged to make significant business decisions for the purpose of influencing the payout of awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The awards are also subject to continued employment through the date our Compensation Committee certifies performance achievement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2016, our Compensation Committee established the net product revenue performance goal of $30.8 billion (at target) for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The same 2016 net product revenue performance goals also apply to one-third of the shares subject to the revenue-based tranche of the performance share awards granted in 2015 and in 2014.

sentences.text: Annual Bonuses
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual bonus plan is designed to reward the achievement of key short-term corporate objectives (such as research and development and strategic goals), as well as individual performance objectives that drive our longer-term corporate performance and growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2016 target bonus opportunities for the Named Executive Officers were established as a percentage of their base salaries.

sentences.text: The annual bonus of our Chief Executive Officer and Executive Chairman was tied solely to our achievement of corporate financial and operational performance objectives based on our operating plan for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The other Named Executive Officers annual bonuses were weighted 75% on achievement of the same corporate financial and operational performance objectives that apply to our Chief Executive Officer and 25% on each executive officers achievement of his or her individual performance objectives, with award amounts determined by the following formula:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Performance Objectives and Achievements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2016 annual bonus plan, our Compensation Committee considered the following corporate performance criteria and our achievement thereof in determining the Named Executive Officer awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 66 al W
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee selected these goals because it believes they represent fundamental categories of our corporate performance based on our 2016 annual operating plan:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Build product pipeline for the future  The pipeline is critical for a research and innovation focused biopharmaceutical company and is a key driver of future growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our pipeline metric is based on the achievement of milestones in early development, discovery research, business development, late-stage development, filings and approvals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Launch and support products  Maintaining and expanding our market share, through successful commercial efforts, is key to our success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This metric is based on the achievement of sales goals around the world, ensuring access of our products to patients in need and partnering with key external constituents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Drive financial results  Financial performance is an indicator of performance, growth and the health of the organization and is  key metric for stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our financial performance metric is based on achievement of annual revenue and expense goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Obtain organizational achievements  The wellbeing of our culture is critical to achieving our business objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our organizational metric is based on achievements in operational efficiency and employee engagement and development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within each category, our Compensation Committee considers our performance against the objectives, the degree of difficulty in achieving the objectives and relevant events and circumstances that affected our performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on these assessments, our Compensation Committee assigns a corporate performance factor between 0% and 150% for each category, as referenced in the table below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee can add or subtract an additional 10% to recognize unplanned factors, provided that the total amount payable may not exceed the maximum bonus opportunity for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our Compensation Committee determines that the overall corporate performance factor for the year was less than 50%, no bonus is payable for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base Salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base salary is the primary fixed component in our executive compensation program and supports our objective of providing competitive compensation that will attract and retain talented executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee believes that base salaries should reflect the responsibilities of the position, the individuals performance for the preceding year, his or her experience, as well as an appropriate pay level relative to similar positions within Gilead and the external competitive market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officer base salary increases are effective on February 1 of each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee reviews and approves our Chief Executive Officers and Executive Chairmans base salary, subject to ratification by the independent members of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, our Compensation Committee approved, and our Board ratified, a 25% increase to Dr. Milligans base salary in conjunction with his promotion to Chief Executive Officer and no change to Dr. Martins base salary as he transitioned into his role as Executive Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The increase to Dr. Milligans base salary reflects the positive view held by both our Compensation Committee and the independent members of our Board of his overall performance, market position in comparison to our compensation peer group, and his leadership in our achievement of key business initiatives and financial objectives, as described earlier in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, in January 2016, Dr. Martin, in his role as Chief Executive Officer, presented his recommendations for base salary increases for the other Named Executive Officers to the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendations for the other Named Executive Officers were based on their individual achievements during 2016, the expectations for their roles moving forward, as well as their competitive market positioning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
